title: The 9 Keys of Amazing Relationships
description:
I believe our world is a reflection of the quality of the intimate relationships we create. In this workshop I offer useful information and techniques to transform our views about the purpose of relationship and its potential for harmony and growth. Learn, practice and be inspired by some of these techniques and step into your role of creating a more harmonious planet, community and intimate relationship. 
  Inspirational as well as interactive, this workshop will introduce 9 areas of knowledge that are essential to the process of navigating into rich, satisfying and authentic relationships. I will guide participants in brief energy exercises, practices in presence, clear communication and exploring courageous authenticity as well as as give background of why each area is important and how they all weave together in a beautiful tapestry of deep love. 
Included and emphasized is a lively and engaging question and answer period.  Participants will walk away with: 
1. Tools and techniques that will enliven and improve their relationships.
 2. Inspiration on how to create healthy, fulfilling relationships. 
3. A feeling of excitement about the deeper possibilities inherent in relationships.
print_description: The 9 Keys of Amazing Relationships

title: The Unchurch Service
description: This is a theatrical performance contrasting religion and spirituality throughout history, and showing how atheists and theists need each other to avoid the pitfalls of religious fundamentalism. The spirituality embedded in religious texts is universal and profound, and has been of great benefit to society, but the undisciplined psychology of human beings leads to its oversimplification and use as a tool to control others. Atheists today are in a unique position to support critical thinking within a religious society that often condemns it.
print_description: The Unchurch Service

title: 3:15 Experiment
description:
No matter where you are on earth, you are welcome to join this writing experiment which explores writing in an altered, undrugged consciousness: a hypnogogic/hypnopompic state. HOW TO PARTICIPATE IN THE 2014 3:15 EXPERIMENT:

    Begin at 3:15 AM on August 1 (or whenever you can join!). Continue each day until August 31.
    You may write any length, style, form, content, voice, rhythm, etc.
    DO NOT EDIT your work. This is raw stuff, baby. That’s part of the experiment. You are welcome to edit, collage, break apart the poems later for whatever purpose you choose, but please SHARE THE RAW STUFF with us on the website after the experiment.
    (Optional) Do not read what you have written until the month is over, except to skim the work to make sure everything is legible.
    TIP: do not use a felt tip pen unless you don’t care about ink stains on your bed. Many a poet has fallen asleep in the middle of writing.
    If you can help it, don’t even get out of bed! The point is to ride that dream state, that precarious point between sleeping and waking and sleeping.

Then come by our camp to share your writing! Read on the Big TV Set or in the Dome of the Space Wanderer. 

If you're up at 3:15am, stop by our camp, be inspired by the otherworldly artwork, and write!
print_description: Join a caravansary of poets to wake during August at 3:15am to write "between sleeps." Stop by our camp to any time to write or share your poems!

title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Daniela Plattner @RhythmWave
description: In this 5Rhythms moving meditation with Daniela Plattner (aka DJ DanielaMoves), you will shake off unwanted worries, sweat out toxic torment, dive deep into the source of your embodied power, surrender to the sacred, and leap out into the playa night with a glowing radiance, re-awakened creative confidence, and maybe some new dancing friends for future fiestas!

title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Eugene Hedlund @RhythmWave
description: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed. It is a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and a mind that is still curious! All are welcome to join Eugene Hedlund on the bamboo at RhythmWave as we bring this gorgeous dance/meditation to BRC for our 8th consecutive year!
print_description: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed. Please join Eugene Hedlund on the bamboo at RhythmWave. All are welcome!

title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Mackenzie Amara @RhythmWave
description: Join DJ Mac (aka Mackenzie Amara) for 5Rhythms dance as a doorway to an experience of our own divinity. Grounded in years of study in psychology and a deep passion for mysticism, Mac embraces the Rhythms as a tool to discover, transcend, and integrate the truth of who we are as human beings.
print_description: Join DJ Mac for 5Rhythms dance as a doorway to an experience of our own divinity, embracing the Rhythms as a tool to discover and integrate our truth.

title: 9 Energies - Know Your Superpower
description: Burning Man is about mind blowing experiences. Send yours on a substance free trip, expand your consciousness without any aids, add new perspectives to your world. Come to 9 Energies to learn how to activate your Superpower at will. Learn about the 9 Active Energies - which one is your Superpower and how do you activate it? The human journey encompasses connection to source, others, soul and self and once in connection to transformation - where are we, what is most alive, what is possible, how do we actually do that and how do we do it without force together. Visit the 9 Energies sub-camp (sober please) 10am-2pm everyday to experience your Superpower activation and find your gift to the human continuum.
print_description: Come to 9 Energies to learn how to activate your Superpower at will. Learn about the 9 Active Energies - which one is your Superpower?

title: A big YEE-SAW from Texas
description:
The YEEEEE-SAWWWW! (screamed loudly with a typical Texas drawl to express joy or exuberance) promises to be the most interactive and entertaining see-saw you've ever experienced.

At 33' long x 28' tall, this perfectly balanced see-saw includes an adult playground comprised of a dance platform, pole and jungle gym. A center pole rises through the dance platform and moves with the Yee-Saw. Dancers can use this to radically express themselves while also controlling the riders' experience. Scale the triangular truss to operate from the top of the pole and for a great view of the playa.

This year, the machine has successfully entertained the nearly 3,000 member strong Burning Flipside community. It’s now eagerly waiting to play with all of you beautiful people.

Seatbelts ON!
It’s Yee-Saw Time!
print_description: The YEEE-SAW! (screamed w/Texas drawl to express exuberance!) is a 33' long, 28' tall, perfectly balanced see-saw and adult playground! Seatbelts ON!

title: A Capella Chorus Jam
description: Like to sing? Come to our vocal jam. A few years ago, we had a blast when a spontaneous chorus broke out in our camp, covering classic harmony-rich songs like Billy Joel's "For the Longest Time," and a tradition was born. We will gather and sing popular, well-known, or timeless songs in harmony (e.g., folk, pop, rock, opera, blues, barbershop, and on and on), without accompaniment (a capella). Song title lists provided to spark your vocal chords. All are welcome - no training needed.
print_description: Like to sing? Vocally jam timeless songs with us, in harmony. We'll do well-known pop, folk, rock, &c. No instruments. Song (lyric) sheets provided.

title: Access the Akashic Records
description: The Akashic Records are the place where past lives, future lives, and present time live. Transformation on all levels of being is possible in this place. It is the center of the heart, which is the Oneness, and from this place, we can learn to access the future of our dreams as a human species. Come learn a variety of entry points into the Akashic Records for the purpose of healing both past life and current life trauma so that you can live into a new way of being in the world. Learn how to receive direct Guidance from your Angels in clear words whenever you need it, and access a pure vibration of Love that will free you from all of the prisons that you have created for yourself.
print_description: Access the Akashic Records

title: AcroYoga Laugh Riot featuring Susan
description: AcroYoga is a safe space to touch strangers, climb on top of people and get yourself into amazing daredevil, inverted postures that make for incredible instagram posts. We will be flying on each other’s feet, hands, shins, forearms and maybe even doing some multi-level, upside down pyramids depending on how the crow flies and where the eagle lands. Susan will give you a hell of a workout disguised cleverly as a romp on the playground. Acroyoga is about trusting other people enough to climb and be climbed on. Come one, come all, all levels welcome. Laughter is mandatory, sparkly pants are not mandatory however are highly recommended. If you’ve never met Susan don’t worry she’ll make you laugh, then she’ll make you do pushups. Let’s be strong, let’s be brave, let’s do some acrobatic, contact yoga already.
print_description: AcroYoga is a safe space to touch strangers, climb on top of people and get yourself into amazing daredevil, inverted postures that make for incredibl

title: ACTIVE LISTENING
description: Listening seems to be a lost art form. Talking heads on TV scream over each other, meetings are often a cacophony of entrenched opinions or even chatting with a friend can sometimes seem like a spewing of 2 people without each listening to the other. But when listening is used to your benefit, it presents the amazing opportunity to enrich your life with the stories of those around us, offering perspective, wisdom and connection. In this workshop you will learn the skill of active listening. You will learn how to engage those around you with a silence that demonstrates your deep compassion, understanding and interest for the story they are sharing with you.
print_description: Learn the lost art of active listening and engage those around you with a silence that demonstrates your deep compassion and understanding for them.

title: Adopt a Virgin
description:
Is this your first year out and you're feeling a bit overwhelmed by all of it? Not sure exactly what it is, or what it ain't? Wanna make sure you're doing it right? C'mon down for adopt a virgin, and meet an experienced veteran who will show you how it's supposed to be done.

Maybe you're a grumpy ole cooter who thinks these kids today are fucking retarded, don't know shit about Bob Dobbs, and are desecrating your beloved Burn? You're right, they are, and this is your chance to show them how it's supposed to be done. Because you have a responsibility to impart the culture on the new waves if you want it to be preserved, and quite frankly, we're sick of listening to your complaining.
print_description: 1st year & want to learn Burner culture? Think these kids today don't know shit about Bob Dobbs? C'mon down for Virgin & Mentor introductions.

description: Sabin Aell works with the energy field that our mind and body is composed of. When the energy is properly distributed and circulating freely, the body is healthy. This field holds all your desires, believes and thought forms.The relationship each of us has with them is responsible for your emotions, health, success and happiness. Through connecting and redirecting of the energy streams, Sabin recomposes and aligns the energy. Her work focuses on your inner strength. She stabilizes your main energy flows extends their power and brings them back into your awareness. Her techniques include gentle touch, crystals, stones, metal, sound and more. Her work is called “AELLWORKS” - only @ ShangriLa!

title: After Hours Jam and Chai
description: When the Night starts to chill…the warmth will thrill... at After Hours Jam and Chai. After Reverbia's Black Rock Night's Live Concert ends…transport a few steps over with us into our cozy, warm Embassy tent structure..where one of our amazing bands will perform a set in jam session format…as Blue Mountain mixes up a pot of his famous Maui love Chai.  The vibes will be high…with Jam and Chai!!  *1 giant pot of Chai will be made nightly…bring your own small cup.

title: Afternoon Coffee - Monday, Wednesday and Friday
description:
Need an afternoon PICK-ME-UP?                                          A little energy before another night on the Playa?


Roasted Breaux & Coffee Heaux Coffee Camp will be open on Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 2-4 PM. Bring family, friends, lovers and strangers and create your own unique blend from our wide range of International coffees.  You have the opportunity to hand grind you own unique selection of coffee that will be served pour-over style. Then pull up a chair or a pillow and sit, relax and visit with friends, new and old, in our coffee house lounge.

We will also be roasting our coffee at various times throughout the week so you won’t find a fresher cup of coffee in BRC. Come in, hang out and if you feel up to it, join in and help us roast our next batch of Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux coffee.  

Ask about coming by and roasting your own on-the-playa beans to bring back to the default world (a little playa dust in the mix makes a great brew!) or help us gift a fresh cup of coffee to the burners who are serving the BRC community.

In the LNT (Leave No Trace) spirit, please remember to bring your own cup.

title: After the Burn Man-to-Man Play
description: As the hot coals of the Man burn cool from white and red to black and grey, adult Gay, Bi & Curious men of the Playa crowd into Down Low Club to enjoy a night of über hot man-to-man action. After being open 24/7 all week, our discreet, enclosed & air-conditioned manplay tent celebrates all things male until dawn. As we close another testosterone-fueled year on the Playa, this night at Down Low Club is yours to live, men! Still curious? Fantasies yet to live? Don't go home without checking it out. Remember, what happens at Burning Man stays at Burning Man.
print_description: After the Burn adult Gay, Bi & Curious men crowd into Down Low Club's discreet, enclosed & air-cooled tent for a night of über hot man-to-man action!

title: Agnihotra Sunrise Fire Ceremony with Live Didgerid
description: Agnihotra is a small fire ceremony done at the precise moment of sunrise and sunset. It's accompanied by a short mantra and followed by meditation and/it reflection on the flame. It is said that the smoke and ash from agnihotra purify and cleanse anything and anyone in the immediate surrounding. It's also said to neutralize radiation in the environment.
print_description: Agnihotra is a small fire ceremony done at the precise moment of sunrise and sunset.

title: AikiDance w/Luna @RhythmWave
description: Join Luna for AikiDance @RhythmWave! AikiDance is a fun, enriching and creative new movement form, incorporating concepts from the Japanese peaceful martial art Aikido; Reiki, the Japanese hands on energy healing technique, contact improv, conscious dance, and yoga. In AikiDance we incorporate props: flowing scarves, light-weight spheres, and staves, which help to deepen awareness of making shapes in space such as spirals, orbs and cardinal directions. AikiDance explores the elements of air, water, fire, and earth, compass directions, and chakras with their corresponding colors. Props, compass directions, elements, and colors combine in infinite ways to aid one’s imagination and awaken the dancing warrior!
print_description: Join Luna for AikiDance - a fun and creative new conscious dance form based on the peaceful Japanese martial art, Aikido. Only at RhythmWave!

Come and enjoy some yummy drinks and good company while we spray your body with fabulous designs sure to make the entire playa jealous  ;)  Come back and check out our activity board posted in the front of our camp for more info on events and less official body painting times, or just drop by to say hi.  We're always down to paint, drink and snuggle with a fellow cuddler.
print_description: Come get an airbrushed stencil design or an original work of body art by our resident CuddleCult Painter and his lovely assistants.

Clove & Danielle are getting married in San Francisco on Fri. Aug. 22, 2014, and Burning Man is our honeymoon. Dani has never been and this will be my 5th time out.  We are hoping all our friends and playa family will join us for an Alice in Wonderland themed Tea Party reception at Poly Paradise.

http://rainbowweddingnetwork.ourperfecthoneymoon.com/CloveAndDanielle

BYOAnything that helps you be comfortable and enjoy yourself. Dress up as your fave Alice character or come in or out of whatever you wish. We just hope you will help us celebrate!!

title: All Things Burning Man
description: Burning Man continues to grow globally through a number of organizations including the Burning Man Project, Burners without Borders, Black Rock Arts Foundation, Black Rock Solar, Regional Groups, Regional Burns and so much more.  Come and explore some of these amazing organizations and discuss with the people that make Burning Man happen in their communities around the Globe.  Find out what makes these organizations "tick" --- what it takes to Bridge the Gap between the magic of Black Rock City and the "default" world.
print_description: A day dedicated to exploring the issues and developments taking place within our community of Burners around the world.

A tidal-shift is happening in the west, with repercussions for the whole world. Women are rising up, and gaining significant power, wealth and influence. title: An Evening of Circus and Fire with Garnish!
description: Come share an evening with Garnish, one of Black Rock City's longest-running fire conclaves! Fill your canteen with offerings from the Suck ‘n’ Fuck Saloon, converted into a comfortable sultan’s tent with indoor seating, then catch the beautifully choreographed performance outside. It will be a breathtaking spectacle of circus acrobatics and fire, fit for bejeweled emperors and dusty wanderers. Raise a torch and a glass with us as we celebrate our communal desert journey and put on one of the best fire shows on the playa.

title: An Exploration of Yin and Yang
description: This is an energetic yet deeply calming, mind-body workshop. The workshop will begin with a high energy Vinyasa practice with a central focus on the hips and heart. It will incorporate strength, flexibility, balance, physical and mental stamina in one session. The practice is beginner based but challenging and suitable for students of all levels.The workshop will transition to Yin inspired surrender postures that focus on the principles of yin yoga to replenish, revive, balance and restore the entire mind, body and spirit.The class will close with an extended meditation

title: Anita's Dropship
description:
Stop waiting for The Drop!
Come listen to a dynamic generative dubstep music machine where YOU work for the build and YOU call The Drop.

Anita's Dropship is a mobile sound system playing generative dubstep that produces drops on demand by user input. 

We want you out here with us. 

For this brief party we will be celebrating all the incredible contributors of the project, along with everyone else nearby. We will captivate you with music, you will dance, you will be happy, and when you feel like you want to crank up the beat, that is what you will do. With two cranks on Anita's Dropship, you can fan the flame of the musical crescendo until you ultimately climax with a glowing red button. With one punch, you summon THE DROP which will bring all those within earshot to their knees. 

Anita's Dropship!

Please join us at sundown, Wednesday 8/27, on the playa, across the esplanade from The Institute.

title: Annual Mr. Beard Rock City Contest!
description: "Calling all of you facially hirsute throwbacks out there, gather up and deliver your fine self, along with your inner and outer beards to the House of the Automatic Subconscious, where we shall take the time to parade you before us like so much hairy meat and pass judgment upon those locks and curls that cascade off of the area known as your chinny-chin-chin. There will be 4 prime categories: Full-Beard, Moustache, Freestyle Full Beard, Fake Beard and quite probably not possibly, an 'Other' category. As per usual in this sort of event, our highly esteemed panel of untrained professionals will judge upon such features as glossiness of pelt, lack of nits, creativity, fullness of body, amount of previous dinner ensconced within and other equally tangible parameters that attest to the care and feeding of your personal face troll. Bribery and foolishness are considered de rigueur. All that is necessary is that you have some form of facial hair, a good and jolly spirit, and the necessary accoutrement of a cummerbund. One must have the proper air of formality around such an event as this, do not you agree?"
print_description: All ye razor-challenged Ladies & Gents, come on out and display your fine chinny-chin-chin hirsuteness at our annual Beautiful Beast Competition!

title: [A]nnual Reddit r/burningman Meet-up
description: "Leave your Overly Attached Girlfriends at center camp, but bring your Good Girl Ginas. Enjoy the ""Friend Zone"" hammock space 20 feet above the Esplanade in our ridiculously photogenic dome. Advice Mallard sa.......god. 3 years....... I have been doing these things for 3 years. Stupid line after stupid line. There is more to life them memes and pictures of fucking cats! I don't know what to write. Do you people even read these? I'm not a ""clever man"". Do You Have idea how long it took me to write the short description? Like any idea? I hate to write and that shit took me like 2 hours. Really! Like 2 entire hours. Trying to think of lame punchy puns just for your enjoyment. Trying to get The Burning Man Meet-Up ""back to it's roots"". I mean half you fucking people will still miss the event and be like ""I meant to go, but 15 drag queens in an art car wanted to have mimosas at the trash fence"". YOU HAD ONE JOB, make it to the meet-up and pretend to not hate people for like a couple hours, but no you couldn't get your dusty, sun burnt ass out of your hexayurt. I don't know what I was expecting. Honestly I don't even know why I bother. Fuck you people! "
print_description: Our annual Reddit gathering...you probably missed it last year...BE THERE!

title: An Unconventional Wedding: Julia’s Self-Marriage
description: The journey of falling in love with ourselves is the most fundamental journey we take in our lifetimes - but before we make sacred vows with a partner, we must first make them to ourselves. After years of struggling to love herself and looking outside to her parents, the media and of course - men - for validation, Julia Allison has come home to the fact that she will never feel whole in love until she loves herself wholly. Please join this exuberant celebration & sacred ritual of self-love, officiated by Rabbi Marc Gafni and Priestess of Love Annie Lalla, with performances by bridesmaids The Shes, Maid of Honor Nisha Moodley, and a special performance by the Bride herself. The entire community will recite vows of commitment to themselves. And yes, the Bride will be wearing white.
print_description: You are cordially invited to celebrate the wedding of Julia Allison (aka Rainbow) to herself. The entire community will recite vows of commitment.

title: Après Ski Party on the Playa 2014
description:
Welcome to the best little party on the playa!

Après ski Black Rock City is back for 2014!

Same Wednesday night and same area as years past. 3 ish and G-spot zone!

Come down(wink wink) off the slopes and Party with us in true Après ski style! We have snow so wear your old-skool ski gear, toques, goggles, anything winter-sport related!

We will be serving up lots of Fireball and White wine sangria so make sure you saddle up to the bar with some friends and have a 4 person shot with the shot-ski! 4 shot glasses stuck to a ski which when tipped back always gets a little messy for the ill timed rookie! And for those burly types we will have 2 person mug-a-chugs! A beer mug on each end of a snowboard full of beer. If you're afraid of commitment then mug-a-chugs aren't for you!

And the main reason we put all this effort into doing this is to bring back the best music on the playa! The undisputed Queen of Après ski music, Foxy Moron willl once again be rounding up the funkiest DJs on the playa! Can't tell you who till closer to the date!

Ski you August 27th on the playa!
print_description: Welcome to the best little party on the playa! Après ski Black Rock City is back for 2014!

title: ART TOUR - Bicycle Tour
description: See the Carvansary “grand commerce of ideas” as envisioned by our artists!  This informal bike tour is hosted by volunteers from the ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). A curated group of art projects will be visited and discussed. This tour will begin at 10:00 AM and run approximately 60-90 minutes, weather permitting. The tours are flexible so feel free to join us on playa if you see a bunch of bikes traveling in a pack, or drop out if you want. The tour starts promptly at the bike racks across from the ARTery (on the Esplanade). Note that there are also ART TOUR - Guided Tour (search Playa Events), and self guided tours (paper copies) available at the ARTery. Most of the art on the playa is self-funded, so be sure to check out your favorite art projects on the Burning Man website now, and then help fund them or volunteer through their respective websites. It takes every single one of us to make Burning Man happen...
print_description: Guided bicycle tour hosted by the ARTery (6:25/Esp) of curated art projects.   Meet at the bike racks in front of ARTery @ 10 AM.

title: ART TOUR - Guided
description: It's all about the ART projects and the fabulous Artists and their teams who create them! Ride in style on a bus/mutant vehicle as volunteers from the ARTery provide information on curated art pieces, as well as the Temple and The Man. Guided Vehicle tours run Tue-Fri and begin at 11:00 AM at Everywhere. Vehicle Tours are for people with mobility issues -- seniors, pregnant women, folks with ongoing temporary disabilities, accompanied children, and others who might face challenges in getting out and around the playa. You must have tickets in advance to get a seat on the bus. Tickets are available @ 9 AM the day of the tour at Everywhere (6:22 & Esplanade). Also there are separate ART TOUR - Bicycles (search Playa Directory), OR Do Your Own Tour! Self-guided (paper map) tours available at the ARTery (on Esplanade)
print_description: Guided Art Tour on bus/mutant vehicle for the mobility challenged provided by the ARTery.  Tix avail 9 AM  day of the tour at Everywhere (6:22/Esp)

Specialty cocktails will be served in the blink of an eye while the entrancing mash-ups (music with lyrics!) of guest DJ Lobsterdust (Bootie, LA & NYC) compels you to dance. Come dressed as a Genie, a Djinn, or even an Astronaut for an out of this world “potion”. There will be plenty of lamps to rub and helmets to open, and you never know what may pop out! Your wish is our command, but be careful what you wish for, because you just might get it!
print_description: Materialize in our I Dream of Jeannie themed harem tent, for a magic potion & the beats of DJ Lobster Dust. Make a wish & find a master. Costumes a +!

title: Aura Fluffing @ ShangriLa
description: Aura fluffing? What the heck is that? Aura fluffing is silly! But that does not mean it is frivolous or unimportant. A vibrant Aura can fill a room. When the Aura is vibrant, we feel happy, joyful and confident. When our Auras are in need of repair, we may feel dark, burdened, like we don’t want to be around anyone, unhappy or even depressed. At its simplest, aura fluffing is a fun way to give and receive support. Re-energize your electrical force field to a positive vibration. Learn to renew your aura to an invigorated state @ ShangriLa.

We will be throwing kangaroo bangas on the barbie until sundown. Join us for an authentic yard BBQ party celebrating our national day. Australians will be on hand to answer all your Down Under questions.

title: Authentic Relating Games
description: Fun and highly-interactive group exercises that explore ways of seeing, connecting, and appreciating yourself and others at a deeper level. They are safe places for taking risks, practicing the art of relating with others, playing a little more outside our comfort zones and discovering more about ourselves than we might in our everyday lives, and having fun! THEME: SEXUAL ENERGY.
print_description: Explore yourself/others at a deeper level.Take risks & play outside your comfort zone in this interactive game of deep sexual energy.Singles welcome.

title: Autogenesis of the Brane
description: Throughout the week, visitors to the Large Harmonic Collider camp will leave their personal interpretations of scientific inquiries, to be digested by the Brane, a spatiotemporal geodome artifact synthesizing wind, light, sound and thought. Experience an Autogenesis of the Brane, where we will interpret the musings of Burners, guide a sonic/visual performance of the Brane's language with strings and percussion, and complete an autogenic training with the Cosmic Rain Game, making music with our bodies and watching the lights react.
print_description: Come attempt to interpret science and make music with our Brane: a spatiotemporal geodome artifact synthesizing wind, light, sound and thought.

title: Awakening as an Outrageous Evolutionary Lover
description: Come and learn the five distinct steps to awaken as an Outrageous Lover. Ordinary Love will not get you there. Only Outrageous Love will transform your life and the life of the planet. Enacting a politics of love and eros rooted in the evolutionary impulse, awakening as you, is our generation's evolution of consciousness. The sexual, the political, the personal and the global are all one. Facilitated by Annie Lalla and Marc Gafni

title: A Wish For The World
description: Do you have a wish for the world? Clean oceans? Healthy bees? What if everyone in the world forgot their betrayals, and remembered all their good?  What if every child on the planet shouted, "*Open your heart!*"  What if we eradicated narcissism?  What do you wish for the world?  What if more than 60 thousand people, all at once, mediated for 20 minutes on what they hope for the world?  ~  Friday, August 29, 4:40-5:00pm  ~  Wherever you are, contemplate your wish coming true..... (what if you realized this is a love note to you...)

description: Attention smart asses! If you love going to Burning Man, but hate missing your weekly bar trivia game, we've got you covered. If knowledge isn't your cup of tea, we have exciting physical challenges to help you relive your childhood Double Dare dreams! Fabulous prizes to the players who prove themselves worthy as trivia champions!

description: Have a few days in Black Rock City have made your beard nappy, gross, and/or caked with playa dust? Come by for a clean-up at VICE camp on Thursday from 1 to 4 PM. Removal of scraggly strands—a few snips here and there—is also an available service for those who need some help with shaping their beard or mustache.

title: Bedouin Lounge
description:
Give me your tired, your poor, your huddled masses yearning to breathe free; 
The wretched refuse of your teeming shore. 

Send these, the homeless, tempest-tossed, to me; I lift my lamp beside the golden door.

Join The Cabana Club as we open our doors to all who are weary and burdened down by the plight of the desert.

Rock out to the sounds of our Nomadic DJ's, traveling from far away places to bring you the best party on the Playa.
print_description: Join us as we open our doors to all who are weary and burdened down by the plight of the desert.  Belly dancing, nomads, genies and magic. Bar/Food/DJ

title: Bedouin Oil Bath at The Iron Rose
description:
The desert is hot. The desert is dusty.  But we at The Iron Rose have a little treat for you!  Please join us on Thursday at 2pm for a Bedouin Oil Bath.  It is just the right touch of luxury late in the week to rejuvenate your senses.  All are welcome.

BUT!!!!!

You MUST bring a towel or cloth to sit on or be mercilessly turned away!!  No one wants to sit on an oily cushion.  

Your body will thank you!
print_description: Use the power of oil & Strigil to clean the dust from your limbs on Thursday at 2pm. Bring a towel or cloth to sit upon. Nobody likes an oily cushion!

title: Being Danced w/Shannon Sahaja @RhythmWave
description:
Being Danced is a unique dance experience designed to expand your range of movement, your field of perception, and your participation with presence.  Learning to look at the dance floor as a blank canvas with you and your movement and choices as the paint!! We will weave together the themes and tools we investigated, add excellent music, and dive into a conscious dance journey as a living, breathing, work of ART (Awareness Resting in Timelessness).  
 
Shannon Sahaja facilitates an innovative style of dance which combines awareness training from contact improvisation, Kundalini Dance, and Soul Motion, creating a safe, playful, and loving space for you to release inhibitions and dare to be seen. Devoted to helping people dance and move and connect with their bodies so that they can be happy and healthy and enjoy life to its fullest!
print_description: Being Danced is a unique dance experience designed to expand your range of movement, your field of perception, and your participation with presence.

title: Beyond Duality: Perspectives & Breathing
description: This workshop includes a talk and hands-on presentation of practical tools, breathing exercises and techniques that cultivate presence, balance and peace. The talk aims to establish a higher perspective and a neutral place that exists outside the perils of right/wrong polarity based mental systems. Story telling and metaphor are used to impart knowledge, expand the mind and illuminate the pitfalls of duality consciousness, which are road blocks to harmony. Learn how to live a free, more fulfilling life now. New skills are provided while practicing with tools, exercises and techniques that are designed to create balance in the nervous system and peace in the mind. This experience will provide an individual strength and clarity when approaching any difficult situation or life choice. You will learn how to heal disharmony in yourself and others. When we do the great work on the self we create a more healthful inner climate and in turn create a more peaceful world around us.

title: Big Al Burn
description:
Big Al is a 21.5 foot tall wooden alligator head effigy representing the New Orleans Burning Man Community. The NOLA burners create a similar effigy every year for Burning Bayou, their local burner-friendly event, at T-Bois Blues Festival in Larose, Louisiana. This installation pays homage to the spark that brought the NOLA Community together, the inspiring event known as Burning Man.

Come celebrate with us as we BURN Big Al down!
print_description: Big Al the giant wooden alligator head effigy representing the New Orleans Burning Man Community will BURN! Come celebrate with us.

title: Love and Intimacy in Open Relationships
description:
This workshop will explore love and intimacy in the context of open relationships.

Most of us grew up with monogamy as the default model for what loving intimacy and partnership look like. Many assume that open relationships must always sacrifice deep love and intimacy, in favor of a more shallow connection with multiple people. 

I believe that deep love and intimacy remains, for many us, a core human need, regardless of what form of relationship we choose. We will explore what love and intimacy mean in the context of open relationships, and how we can create it for ourselves and those we love.
print_description: Love and Intimacy in Open Relationships

title: billgilman
description: Mashup Mania is a game show where two players are competing to see who can recognize the most elements of a mashup or cover song. In the case of a cover song, for example, they could name the original band and song name, and the band currently doing the cover.  For a mashup, they could name the different performers, and the different songs, depending on how many songs are being mashed up.  Each correct answer gets 1 point for whoever rings on first, but if they miss any question, the other player gets to hear 10 more seconds and has the opportunity to answer, and gets TWO points for each answer.  This is so that players don't just rush to buzz in if they recognize only one component.  First one to 10 with at least two points more than their opponent wins (kind of like volleyball scoring).  Depending on how many players, we would have an elimination tournament.

title: Black Rock Portrait Project Art Gallery Opening
description:
Join us at the Black Rock Portrait Project "Art Gallery" at Whiskey & Dust 5:30pm-7:30pm on Wednesday. Meet the Artist, oil painter M Vlasic, get "shot", & see oil paintings of the citizens of Black Rock City (and other paintings by the artist). The artist will be taking more photographs of Burners at the opening, some of which may become oil paintings... Will YOU be the next subject? Wine served.


What is the Black Rock Portrait Project? It is a series of oil paintings of the “Children of the Dust”, the people of the Burning Man community. The people at the event are very unique, not just in their commonly outrageous dress (or undress) but their countenance, their demeanor, is unique to the event. Covered in dust these people have a spirit, a freedom unseen back in the “default” world. Because it is the people that create the event, it is my intention to focus on the individual. The “models” are photographed on-site, (with their written permission) and the paintings are created using these photographs  as a reference following the event. These paintings will eventually be shown in a gallery setting hopefully one which will travel the country. A book about the project is also in the works.
print_description: Meet the Artist M Vlasic, get "shot", & see oil paintings of the citizens of Black Rock City. Will YOU be the next subject? W 5:30-7:30p Wine served.

title: Black Rock Solar's Solar Playa International
description:
Join Black Rock Solar and Snow Koan Solar at its annual playa event Solar Playa International. While sipping on a mint julep or ice cold beer, you will get a chance to meet the staff and crew of Black Rock Solar as well as other Burners doing meaningful and innovative work around the country.  The purpose of this event is to bring together all of the different groups and individuals on playa doing work in renewable energy, climate change, environmental outreach, and policy.  Tell us about your projects and learn about ours. 

Since 2007 Black Rock Solar has been building solar arrays in Nevada and giving them away at little or no cost. To date BRS has built over 5 megawatts of clean renewable energy.  BRS prioritizes installations for schools, hospitals, rural communities, non-profit groups, and Native American tribes.
print_description: Sip a mint julep, learn about Black Rock & Snow Koan Solar, share what you’re doing in the world of renewable energy and discuss the future of solar.

title: Blind Taste Pairing
description: Ready to be blindfolded and indulge in a sensory smell/taste experience? Start your Thursday with a nibble at our Blind Diner, situated at the Pedal Pies in Home Rule Village for an immersive blind dining. Don't expect to be fed a full meal, but DO expect a lot of small perks, including taste pairings constructed by our camp of chefs, and an opportunity to construct a taste pairing for the next blind diner after you have finished with your experience. PLEASE BRING YOUR OWN PLATE / BOWL. We will offer blindfolds, ear plugs, and a shaded dome for our events which include blind tastings on Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday. Come check out our event schedule. Home Rule Village is at 4:30 & C, find the Blind Diner near 4:45 & D. Also check out the Pedal Pies' mobile Pizza Oven, a wood-fired pizza oven mounted on a trailer and transported around the playa on bicycles, churning out authentic wood-fired pizzas at random times and locations.

Ice cold Blue Moon beer with a shot of Harlem - an 80 proof mandarin orange flavored kruiden (herbal) liquor named after a city in Amsterdam called Haarlem.  This will be a great kick starter to your day :).   And feel free to stay a while and chill in our pillow tent or fur hammock haven!

title: Blues Dancing for the Playa
description: Tango milongas are Monday and Wednesday, Blues dances are on Tuesday and Thursday. In our classes, you’ll learn how to do these two social partner dances, how to connect with the music and your partner, how to relax, you’ll get to meet and interact with your playa brethren, and you’ll dance a bunch. During the guided practice time, you’ll have a chance to practice during the day and ask questions of the experienced dancers hanging out. At happy hour, grab a cup of tea, dance and chill and watch the dome light up. Listen to live music if we have a drop-in musician (or let us know if you you’d like to play some blues or tango music at our camp). And then in the evening, dress up, and come dance the night away. We keep the music running at all hours.
print_description: Come learn the awesome power of Blues Dance. Simple and gritty- we'll teach you how to connect with the music, yourself, and another person!

title: Bondage Rope, Sun Hats, and Stickers, Oh My!
description:
We come bearing gifts for the masses--hundreds of sun hats that we've been collecting all year (and some accessories, too!).  Did you forget to bring a crucial sun-blocking head piece?  Or do you need to collect something through your travels to add to your Playa wardrobe?  Either way, we can help you pick out the perfect complement for your Playa attire, and add a custom chin strap so that your new chapeau doesn't fly away in the Playa wind to become trash fence MOOP.  Then, with your permission, we'll take a lovely photo of you sporting your fashion goodness.  Photos can be accessed later online.  And don't worry--we never post anything without asking permission first.

Also:  Do you need hemp rope for those on-Playa bondage classes?  Or to tie up (or tie down), that special Playa someone?  We have lots to give away...and we'll teach you a knot or two while we're at it.  Ask very nicely, and we may give you a suspension bondage ride, or grant you a trip to the view tower to watch the sunset.  Take a tour of our alternative energy usage and grey water recycling.  And don’t forget to pick up one of Camp Conduit’s free bumper stickers.
print_description: Gifting bondage rope, knot instruction, sun hats, stickers, and suspension bondage rides to denizens of the Playa. Great views from our crow's nest!

title: Bootie BRC: AutoSub
description: OMG MUSIC WITH WORDS! Now in its 9th year on the playa, A Plus D bring BOOTIE BRC, the internationally-infamous mashup bootleg party, to Black Rock City! With guest DJs Lobsterdust, Entyme, Faroff, Airsun, and more – along with mashup shows and performances throughout the night – Bootie BRC celebrates (and satirizes) pop culture both past and present, keeping your brain guessing and body dancing with creative song combinations. Mixing and matching every musical genre, era, and style into one big dance party, it's the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation -- with free mashup CDs given away like candy! Launched in 2003 in San Francisco, Bootie was the first club night dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup, and is now the biggest mashup event in the world, with regular parties in several cities on four continents. Bootie BRC is presented in part by the BRC Weekly, Black Rock City's independent newsweekly. Bootie ... because one song at a time just isn't enough.
print_description: OMG MUSIC WITH WORDS!! The greatest mashup party evah comes to AutoSub for its 9th year! DJs A Plus D and guests turn 2 songs into 1! Dusk till dawn!

title: Break Through Your Fear Closet (Arrow-Breaking)
description:
Fear often gets in our way in realizing our life goals and achieving our highest potential. Fear sometimes get embedded deep in our psyche and will remain there until and unless we choose to address them. Granted it is easy to ignore our fears and stay in the comfort zone, yet imagine life's possibilities if we confront our fears. 

In this workshop, we will breakthrough our fears by breaking an arrow with our throat as a metaphorical exercise. It can be fear related to us growing up as queer individuals or any other personal fears that gets in our way to becoming our full two-spirit beautiful self. Participants must be sober to participate. Limited arrows available.
print_description: Arrow-breaking workshop! Break through fears that get in our way to becoming our most true self and reach our highest potential.

title: Breath, empathy and contact massage
description: The secret is presence, the language is you senses and sensitivity. We will explore breath, how it relates to contact, subtle listening, empathy and different states of reactivity and consciousness. Beginning with arriving and dropping in we will guide you in and through connection, empathy and attachment, leading you to light and deep touch. We will explore alignment, structure and joint integrity giving you a safe and intentional environment to move into body rolling and contact massage. You will leave relaxed and refreshed with some tools that will help you both on the playa and in the default world.
print_description: We'll explore subtle sensitivity as it relates to breath, empathy, and contact massage, giving you techniques and tools for the playa, and beyond.

print_description: Warrior, Cobra plus the extreme extended Child pose! We cover them all! Come practice while listening to chill beats and get ready for the weekend.

title: Brides Maid Dance Party
description:
A lovely camp with people from here, there and far far away invites you to wear your dress and have a wonderful time in our casbah. Expect nothing less than a challenging fortune wheel and some very special gifts especially for the female goddess on the planet. 
The tradition of IN DUST WE TRUST lives on...

title: BRING IT! <3 EFT w/ Sonya Sophia
description:
Sonya Sophia is a gifted empath, master level healer and “Love Activist” with 25 years of experience in the healing arts. She is the founder of The Sophia School of Living Arts, an online healing school that produces The World Tapping Circle. This is a 90-minute, life enhancing, interactive Tapping experience within a global, online community Sonya teaches physical and emotional healing using EFT, Emotional Freedom Technique or Tapping, as a foundational practice giving people a visceral experience for their real-time transformation. Those who’ve studied with her now bring the healing gift of EFT to their own families and communities. She brings feminine wisdom, deep love, loads of laughter plus life-changing releases to audiences and workshop participants worldwide. Her mission is to support the healing of humanity and facilitate Heaven on Earth.

Her standing-room only workshops have been offered in the UK, France, Italy, the Netherlands, Germany and all over the United States, from California to New York City. As a guest speaker at the International Alchemy Conference, Leaders Causing Leaders Conference and the Conscious Life Expo, she’s brought the miracle of Tapping to ever expanding audiences. Sonya continues to teach at Transformational Festivals, including her two favorites – The Rainbow Gathering for over 20 years and Burning Man for the last 7 years.

Sonya Sophia invented and published the format for EFT Circles, now widely practiced throughout the world. She has created recordings to help people come to life, activate Divine Purpose and step into their true power.
print_description: Divine Purpose Activation!!  See me, hear me, let yourself bring your gifts to this world as an embodied SOUL. Tap out remaining fear and doubt.

title: BURNERS with SOMBREROS
description: It is an undeniable fact: there are more sombreros than Mexicans on Playa! As a Mexican I just get giddy happy when I see my fellow Burners with colorful sombreros throughout Playa.... it simply evokes the festive nature of my culture: fiesta, spirits, baile, canto and some good food! I want to take it a step further and challenge 'cultural appropriation' stigmas out there by making it a WIN-WIN situation here: If you wear a Sombrero on Playa, you gotta KiSS A MEXiCAN! Come celebrate in the BiGGEST GATHERiNG OF BURNERS with SOMBREROS at Center Camp Cafe. Bring your SOMBREROS, your TEQUILA, and your AMiGOS... and together we'll go in search of MEXiCANS ON PLAYA and share the LOVE!!!
print_description: Biggest gathering of Burners with sombreros... Come Celebrate the 11th Principle: If you wear a SOMBRERO ON PLAYA, you gotta KiSS A MEXiCAN!

Come be a part of the conversation!

title: Burning Man PhotoWalk!
description:
An amazing event!  It gets bigger every year, and this one will be very special!  Anyone is welcome.  All skill levels with any kind of camera from DSLRs to Mobile Phones.  It's a super-family-friendly event, so feel free to come and bring some friends!  

Location:  Center Camp (just outside of Center Camp in the direction of The Man
Day and Time:  Tuesday evening at 7 PM 
Hashtag for event: #BMPhotowalk2014  
Prizes:  Something special from +CameraPunk! http://goo.gl/yKz2pG and maybe more!

For this photowalk, we'll have a special theme:  Self-Expression.  Naturally, you can take photos of everything, and I'll be giving instruction, tips, tricks, etc etc... but for the prize, when you post your photos, I'll be choosing a random photo that best exemplifies this theme.  This is gonna be great... I'm really looking forward to meeting everyone!
print_description: Join Trey Ratcliff on a photowalk! All skill levels, any camera from DSLRs to Mobile Phones.  It's a super-family-friendly event! Location: Center C

title: Burning Man Ultramarathon
description:
On Wednesday, August 28th at 5am, runners across the playa will begin the 50 kilometer run (31 miles) from Pink Lightning Camp. We'll run loops around the playa, traveling journeys in our mind that nothing can compete with. We'll dance with you as we run past, give out free sweaty hugs, and ask you to join us. There's still time to train, so dust off those running shoes and prepare to run what promises to be the funnest race of your life. There are competitive runners, those who are just out to have fun, and those who love the sufferfest and love. However you want to run, we have the race for you. Run with us for the race of a lifetime!

For more info, visit our website or email me with your name, gender, race date age, email address, regular address, emergency contact info for off and on the playa, and t-shirt size.

Volunteers (that significant other?) are also welcome to the party of a race.

Get ready to have the ultimate high: runner's high!

Email cherylish@yahoo.com and check out www.burningman50k.com and https://www.facebook.com/events/591387204233888/
print_description: Runners' high! Come party & run 50k (31 miles) w the craziest kids on the playa. Run as many loops as you can! Bring water&snacks. Volunteers wanted!

What can you do ? Well, for a start you can come by Red Rubber Tattoo and let us distract the looks of the judgmental away from your boo boos and toward the cool images we'll put onto your body w/ our big rubber stamps and if you'd like to get into the trade, come by any time and give us a hand-we're missing a few members this year and you can have the fun they'd be having if they hadn't punked out.

title: Cake Walk
description:
We all know Burning Man is a piece of cake. So prove it. 

Come on down to Camp Nimby in the BC Village at 2pm on Wednesday to join us in resurrecting this old-timey fair game  Black Rock City style. 

Funky beats will help move your feets as you jockey for position on one of the numbered place-mats (think musical chairs). Numbers will be drawn and if you find yourself on the winning place-mat, you win! Piece of cake! 

There will be many chances to win but a cake-thirsty attitude is strongly recommended. No one said this would be a cake walk! (wait...)

We can't wait to see you pastry fiends converge on our humble camp.  This event will literally take the cake!
print_description: Free cake. Seriously, free cake. Camp Nimby in the BC village will be hosting a cake walk 2pm Wed. Walk, dance, and play our game for cake prizes!

title: Call to Coffee at the Turkish Delight Cafe
description: It seems like weeks that you have spent trudging across the desert sands. A lifetime of heat and dust. But wait! As the sun begins its trek across the desert sky, a mirage forms on the horizon.Or is it?No, weary traveler, you have found the Turkish Delight. Come and relax in our silken haven, sip coffee or tea, and tell tales of your adventures. Savor the exotic tastes as morning light filters through to the tables, where cezves pour steaming little cups of the flavorful brew.
print_description: Enter the Crystal Medina to relax in our silken haven within, where tea and coffee await. Savor our exotic brews, recline on soft pillows, and chat.

title: Calm Inside
description: Wake up with a blissful dose of Live Music...yawn and stretch, breathe, meditate, set the course for your wonderfully, adventurous day. Calm Inside is designed to let you center your day, before all the hub bub and commotion...thumps thumps and sirens...the inescapable thrills of mayhem and delight. The Live Music will be of a more ambient, soul-filling, relaxation...happiness genre....so come and be at peace!!!  After Calm Inside, enjoy our very popular Live Music Yoga in the Morning…where music meets the pose!  On Wednesday and Friday, a portion of Calm Inside will include guided meditation.

title: Caravan of Smoothies - The Gayborhood Party!
description:
Come to our bustling caravan stop and shelter yourself from all those boring straight parties! Gather around our tent of meeting for now is the time for Queers to PARTY! 

The whole gayborhood is invited for smoothies, dance, whirl the rabbit wheel of bar fortune for a magical beverage of your choice, sexy gender blender games, toss the monkey make-out, and all around queer love fest. Special shout out to Comfort & Joy, Beaverton, Fe Boy Collective, Astropups, Stella, Suspended Animation, PolyParadise, ShamanDome, Yes Please, all the camps that were at the Queer Burner Summit, and all you other fabulous queer camps - if we didn't mention you please show up so we can mention you next year. Our goal is to create the largest ever and most epic gayborhood event. So come and enjoy smoothies and tails! All genders welcome always. (and don't worry if your straight but not narrow you are welcome too...besides by the time you leave you probably will be bent - that's right we recruit!)

title: CARYATID
description:
This action art work utilizes BUTOH-inspired movement to envision an inert, architectural column, carved in the shape of a woman, come to life.  Three sound tracks demonstrate the Kuleshov effect. Viewers will discover various interpretations of the movement with three different soundtracks, or observe the piece utilizing the haptic, environmental soundscape of the performance space.

This short piece is structured in three parts. The first part  serves as an awakening, as the caryatid discovers movement from the perch of the entablature onto which it is mounted.  The second part captures the caryatid’s realization of increased mobility, and the expansion of  its sensate environment.  The third part chronicles the caryatid’s awareness of its limitations, and the slow recognition of its inevitable embrace back to its native form. 

Choreographed by Hortense Gerardo
Produced by in vivo Productions
print_description: Butoh work depicts an architectural column carved in the shape of a woman, coming to life. Three sound tracks demonstrate the Kuleshov effect.

title: ceciNESTpas
description: ceciNESTpas is a nest of 10 meters diameter built by vultures that will invite and welcome wandering travelers. Inside it all around the nest structure are arranged illustrated board of the history of The Jungle Book. The nest will prove to visitor to be a jungle to cross. So while you progress through the story you advance into the jungle to get out at the end of the story. The artist Francesca Nini Carbonini constructs in these illustrations a comparison between the jungle of Kipling with our modern jungle, telling the abandonment in the jungles that over time inexorably become a familiar place in which the individual abandoned finds himself and creates its warm nest, but… ceciNESTpas!

title: Chakra Balancing Hoop Dance Workshop
description: Chakra Balancing Hoop Dance combines the practical wisdom of the Chakra System with the bliss inducing movement of Hoop Dance. Each of the 7 Major Chakras in the Chakra System describe a distinct layer of the human experience on the continuum from your physical reality grounded in your body to the mysterious realm of your non-physical self that is the source of who you really are. Move through the energies of groundedness, sexuality, energy regulation, open hearted love, creative expression, pattern recognition, and divine connection. In this workshop, you will learn how to use the moves and practice principles of Hoop Dance to bring your life into alignment at each chakra level so you feel more balanced and happier. This class is a combination of lecture and movement. Bring your hoops! Free Pink Heart Hoops while they last so get there early!

title: Chakraland Game!
description: Come play the adult version of Candyland...called Chakraland! The Chakraland game is a 22×30 foot vinyl flooring of a multicolored human sized game that participants play by rolling the giant dice and moving towards the different colored squares, each square representing a different chakra. The layout is similar to the child’s game “Candyland”. The squares will all have different quests written on them that need to be completed in a certain timeframe, or players have to go back to the previous square of the same color. There are some short cuts, wild pink squares, and black lose-a-turn squares. The winner makes it to the end of the colored path and gets loved up by the colorful game jesters. Yay, so much fun!
print_description: The Chakraland game is a 22x30ft vinyl floor thats laid out like Candyland, & folks play by rolling the giant dice to move along the colored squares.

title: Channeling with BrianPorzak
description:
Channeling...What Is It & How Is It Of Value?
We may speak or write relaying words from an entity out there. Phone Home. Who to talk to. Why. 
There may be a guest speaker from another dimension.
Channeling is the process of receiving and relaying information from an entity who uses the Channeler to speak or write.

Is it real? How is it possible? What type of information is communicated? Who are these entities who speak or write?

Trance Channeler Brian Porzak discusses his own channeling process and how it has evolved over time.  There may, also, be a guest speaker from another dimension.

description:
The first major Chinese Theme Camp, Chinese Beyond Borders will showcase costumes inspired by Chinese lanterns and also by this year David Best's Temple! The Lantern girls come as far away as Taiwan, Singapore and NYC to strut their stuff on Kostume Kult's runway. DJ from the Middle Kingdom to fill the hours before the ball drop with the funky sounds of the orient, along with Dragon Dance from Shanghai, and try your luck at getting a red envelope from us with an auspicious good luck charm for the year! Dress code: Chinese of course, like the rest of us! Make sure you get outfitted at Kostume Kult for the occasion! Come and count down with us BYOC (Champagne) at Kostume Kult located at Esplanade at 3:30 and stay celebrating the New Day with some NYC Homegrown DJ's after the Ball Drops, HAPPY NEW DAY!

For a little sneak preview, check us out here and join us: https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?v=10152593935738518&set=o.570550866369333&type=3&theater

description: Chris playfully half nelson'd Amanda at Burning Man last year and after 2 amazing nights together they fell in love and spent an impromptu week decompressing in Jamaica. After months of flying between london and LA, Chris made the move to LA and asked Amanda to make him the happiest man alive by marrying him. title: Circus Play Time!
description: YOU ALWAYS WANTED TO RUN OFF AND JOIN THE CIRCUS... NOW YOU CAN! Come earn your clown nose at Circus Boot Camp. You've seen feats of skill on the Playa, and who hasn't dreamed of running off to join the Circus. Heck, half of y'all probably still dream in acrobats and clowns. At Circus Boot Camp, we'll teach you to juggle, unicycle, hoop, slack line, trapeze, crack a whip and indulge your childish fancy in other circus-inspired arts. I know what you're thinking: "Sure, you'll teach me to juggle... after I've spent years on the road washing elephants and dodging monkey poop!" Wrong! Our goal is nothing less than to bring the joys of object manipulation, unicycling and other circus arts to the Playa masses in a casual, friendly and fully clothed environment (ok, mostly-clothed). Already a circus pro? Come test your mettle on our slackline; dance your clown shoes through the obstacles of irony; pass clubs with seasoned semi-professionals; try your hand at the Valley of One-Wheeled Doom!!

title: Collective Mind Salon
description: Our camp is running one of the largest collective consciousness experiments ever conducted, right here on the Playa! We've got 60 random number generators placed all around Black Rock City measuring how our collective playa hive mind might be changing the physics of reality itself. Visit us from 2- 5pm Thursday, Friday, and Saturday to get your special mind-at-large swag, see talks that will blow your mind, and participate in consciousness experiments that you have to see to believe.

title: College Football Tailgate & Viewing Party
description:
Kickoff the Man Burn by watching your favorite teams play on our two portable screens!  This event was a blast last year, so we've added a TV.  Join us to celebrate the start of the season...bring some food & drinks to share...never graduate!

We'll begin early in the morning with the end of the Penn St - UCF game. The highlight of the day will be the Michigan - Appalachian St...wear your Maize 'n Blue gear..champaign will be served with every Wolverine touchdown!

Two TVs will allow us to show multiple games all day, including:
9:00 Appalachian St @ Michigan
9:00 UCLA @ Virginia
12:30 Alabama vs West Virginia
1:00 (Arkansas - Auburn...depends on SEC & DirectV deal)
2:30 Clemson @ Georgia
4:30 Fresno St @ USC
5:00 Oklahoma St @ Florida St
5:00 Washington @ Hawaii
6:00 Wisconsin vs LSU (until 9:00 when we leave for the Man Burn)
print_description: Kickoff the Man Burn by watching your favorite teams play on our two portable screens - wear your school colors...bring food & drink...never graduate!

title: Compassion Corner
description:
The compassion corner will be an art and practice installation featuring the compassion prayer sound mosaic, a compassion meditation workshop, and, possibly, an extemporaneous talk on the science of compassion. The sound mosaic will offer participants the chance to sit and receive a shower of compassion prayers. 

The compassion meditation instruction, rooted in Tibetan Buddhism, will offer guidance on cultivating engaged connection with others, with the intention of relieving suffering and growing happiness. Your host, a scientist and meditation teacher, will offer guidance from various realms of knowledge to promote the appreciation of common humanity and the cultivation of openheartedness that leads to fearlessness and joy.
print_description: The Compassion Corner features the compassion prayer sound mosaic, a meditation workshop, and the chance to receive a shower of compassion prayers!

title: Contradancing to live music
description: Contradancing all levels every night to live music - looped/ traditional/ celtic/ fusion/ techno; fast-paced yet easy to learn with a caller who instructs (but with room for dancers to improvise). title: Cosmicopia
description: Cosmicopia is a Burning Man theme camp dedicated to blending the core principles learned in the Philosophy, Cosmology, and Consciousness graduate program (PCC) at the California Institute of Integral Studies (CIIS) with the 10 principles of Burning Man. Founded in 2010, Cosmicopia is primarily comprised of students from CIIS and in 2014 are hosting the first for-credit class through the Masters of Fine Arts program.

Humo Maya's music can be use as a method to deepen into your subconscious mind and energy bodies to enhanced rapid healing through high vibrational sounds that in combination with a shamanic touch help align the mind, body and spirit into one while connecting with higher realms of consciousness within the own self and by facilitating lucid dreaming as well.

title: Countless Carrot March
description:
JOIN the More Carrot Camp and march on Thursday August 28th to remind those wascally wabbits that call themselves The Bunnies that we are FRIENDS NOT FOOD!

It's time to claim our rights and the rights of all veggie-kind to be treated as the sentient beings we are. 

All Carrots and Allies assemble in your finest green and orange attire for a pre-party from 4pm-6pm at 7:30 & A in the French Quarter before the Billion Bunny March. In true Carrot fashion, we’ll provide drinks, music and much entertainment before we head out to intercept the bunnies at 6pm sharp! 

Bring along your singing voice and your best vegetable themed cocktails to share. While pro carrot, we're certainly a vegetable-friendly group.

Practice your chants, learn some Carrot songs (http://goo.gl/IpyjQ) and, most importantly, join us as our wave of orange and green goodness spreads across the playa!
print_description: Assemble in your finest orange and green attire to March and against Vegetable oppression!

title: Crafting Galore
description:
Burner DIY at the Krafting Dome. Supplies & guidance to upgrade your look or bike. Create something amazing & test it on the Kostume Kult runway!

Kostume Kult recreates the glory days of NYC circa the 1970's by transporting you to the seedy throwback replica of "Times Square BRC". The Empire State Building and 25ft King Kong loom above the NYC skyline while a runway show that blows fashion week out of the dust goes on street level starring you. As a premiere daytime destination, Kostume Kult will be providing costume transformations to the under-accessorized masses of BRC. No person shall go uncostumed or unfabulous because we have a full team of costume stylists ready to dress you up and help you transform. The only thing we ask of you is a proud strut down our runway to display your new duds to booty moving music. If you prefer a DIY approach, step inside our Krafting Dome where you can gain the supplies and know-how to upgrade your bike and your look. Our professional staff knows their way around a glue gun and we're not afraid to bedazzle YOU! The playa provides the grit, we supply the glamour so hop the K Train to costume transformations, music and a non stop runway show that would make RuPaul blush. Of course the city never sleeps and our amazing DJ line up keeps us moving into the night as the city lights shine bright into the dark playa night. Also not to be missed is the Peepshow FreaKKshow, BRC's only 24 hour participatory peep show where you can be the star or simply sneak a peek at some Big Apples! Down our alleys you will find costumes, crafting, sparkle pony vagrants, playa hustlers, burner working gals and street wise tramps. You won't want to miss it so jump the turnstile to the KKrossroads Of The World. After all if you can make it here you can make it anywhere!
print_description: Burner DIY at the Krafting Dome. Supplies & guidance to upgrade your look or bike. Create something amazing & test it on the Kostume Kult runway!

title: Creative Taoist Dance Class
description:
Join us at the Taiwan Souk for a creative dance class, where you will prepare for a traditional Taoist Temple Dance.

Fifi Chang will bring her skills as a dance instructor at the Songshan Temple in Taipei, Taiwan and lead you in creative dance exercises. 

Stick around and gather some blessings at the interactive Taiwan Temple Market!

Join one of our sessions Tuesday or Wednesday, and return for a part in the performance scheduled for Thursday afternoon, just after the Chinese Speakers Tea Party (tea party 2-4pm, Taiwan Souk Tent; we prepare at 3:45 for 4:00 show).
print_description: Join us at the Taiwan Souk for a creative dance class, where you will prepare for a traditional Taoist Temple Dance (Thursday: 3:45pm).

title: Creative Visualization: Picture your future
description:
Join us for a guided creative visualization meditation. We will help you picture the perfect day 10 yrs in your future. The process works by subconsciously shifting your decision making over the next 10 years eventually making your vision a reality.

You don't know what that day looks like? Don't worry, most people don't, but your subconscious already knows what is important to it.  The more amazing and compelling the vision that you let emerge, the more you will be drawn to it. 

How? Most people make between 80 to 400 decisions a day. A rich, compelling visualization with a lot of sensory "hooks" can shift those decisions towards your perfect future because the right choices will feel "right". 

We will start with a mindfulness of breath meditation, a gratitude exercise and then wake up the morning of your perfect day and explore it through a guided process.  After, we will ask a few of those interested to share their visualization with the group.

We look forward to sharing your future day together.

Dr.Feelgood
print_description:
Join us for a guided meditation. We help you picture the perfect day 10 yrs in your future. You will be drawn to it and becomes reality.
Dr.Feelgood
other_location: Dr Feelgood Advice Booth Facing Distrikt

title: Crowd-Sourced Short Stories
description:
This event is a communal effort to collectively write stories that can evolve as a screenplay for short films. All participants will either:
(1) start a new story, 
(2) add a new character to existing story, and/or 
(3) advance the existing story one notch 
No one will get a chance to read the full story, but only a little snippet from previous author. The beauty of randomness is the strength of this communal participation experiment.
print_description: This event is a communal effort to collectively write stories that can evolve as screenplay for short films. Build on previous author's one line story
other_location: Occidental Oasis - Souk @ The Man Base

title: Cuddle Puddle
description:
Camp Cuddle Cult is hosting hour long cuddle puddles all week long!  Come and listen to our swoony tunes by our resident DJ and enjoy a liberating libation with your cuddle curtsey of our soft and lovable bartending staff.  Meet new friends and get all cuddly in our geodesic dome filled with soft pillows, fuzzy blankets and stuffed animals.  All are welcome, however this is a platonic puddle, if you wanna take your cuddle to another level you gotta skedaddle before you skeetdiddle.  

Check back at Camp Cuddle Cult to see a when the next cuddle puddle will be scheduled, or just drop by to say hi, we love seeing your dusty faces!

Come and enjoy some yummy drinks and good company while we spray your body with fabulous designs sure to make the entire playa jealous  ;)  Come back and check out our activity board posted in the front of our camp for more info on events and less official body painting times, or just drop by to say hi.  We're always down to paint, drink and snuggle with a fellow cuddler.
print_description: Come get an airbrushed stencil design or an original work of body art by our resident CuddleCult Painter and his lovely assistants.

title: Cultivating Good Energy
description: This mixed bag of tricks class will set you off on the right foot this Burn. Using a hybrid of movement, breathing, meditation, yoga, qigong, visualization, eye gazing, hugs, chanting, and more, you’ll be guided to clear any energies that are no longer serving you while cultivating good energy and positive intention to keep you feeling amazing and inspired!

title: Cupid's Arrow- An Evolved Dating Guru playshop
description:
Cupid's Arrow: An Evolved Dating Guru

Ready to meet your new love[s]? We're so excited to gather all of you who ARE ready because our mission is to transform loneliness into connection. Whether you're single or in a partnership, this workshop is about having fun and deepening into your heart through Holistic Love exercises. We will guide you through a multidimensional journey that incorporates art, movement, touch, sensuality, and eroticism-- all while growing your capacity to love and be loved. We hope you will come away with ready-to-use skills and an evolved sense of how to bring more of yourself into dating and love connecting experiences. Our intention is to bring the consciousness of collaboration rather than competition in this community dating event--because hey, everyone dates, right? Come prepared to leave behind the old stories to move forward as the wise love guru you are! The guru says..."Let's ROCK this festival to the next evolution of love!"
print_description: Ready to meet your new love[s]? Our mission is to transform loneliness into connection. A multidimensional journey of holistic love exercises

title: Dance your Thoughts into Transformation
description: That rare moment when we find deep quiet in the middle of our dance is rich. But what about the rest of the time? When our monkey mind is fully engaged, our thoughts dance in and among the embodied experience we are having.  In this lab we will embrace our monkey mind and bring our soft focus to these thoughts. We will dip in and out of solos, duets, and group dances, taking time to reflect, journal, and discuss our mind's dance, and discover the pathway to underlying beliefs that hold these thought patterns in place. Once these are revealed, will we find commonality in our thought patterns? What will these beliefs point to regarding our lives off the dance floor?
print_description: Workshop more advanced CI skills, play with score-based improvisation, practice flying, falling and being surprised.

title: Dancing Before Noon: Afro-Brazilian
description: Dancing Before Noon returns Quetzal Guerrero and Sunshine to teach an Afro-Brazilian dance workshop…accompanied by live musicians.  All levels and all ages are invited to learn how to feel and move to the popular Afro-Brazilian rhythms that dominate global culture in many parts of the world.  Quetzal has been performing Samba, Latin, Hip Hop, and Afro-Brazilian music since a young teenager.  Sunshine aka DJ Miss Sunny Z spins Afrobeat, Samba, Latin, and many other rhythms in her Cali Hustle collaboration with Quetzal.  Together, both Quetzal and Sunshine understand Afro-Brazilian music and the movement rhythms that make this dance form so popular.

title: Dancing Freedom
description: Liberate yourself through movement. We invite you to dance with your whole self… not the dance of performers and acrobats, but the dance deep inside of you, the one only you can do. Your dance is your dance. It’s the unique way your body moves, your feelings flow and your soul expresses. It’s the way you connect with self, other, community and the earth. No one else can do it for you. So, come home, remember and renew. Join us in the dance.
print_description: Dance your Dance! In this shamanic, ecstatic dance journey, you’re invited to come home to yourself. Facilitated dance journey in a safe comfy place.

title: Dancing Freedom
description: Dancing Freedom with Lindsey Morriss: Harvesting your Medicine, Owning your Brilliance. Through free-form movement, divine mindfulness, and epic music we will dance out our inherent wisdom, power and light. Dancing Freedom is a living worldview and a guided dance journey that moves through an elemental wave: earth, water, fire, air and ether. Through shamanic, expressive, ecstatic and somatic practices we realize true freedom and authenticity as body-based experiences and recognize our spiritual nature as conscious energy beings with infinite potential. Dancing Freedom is movement as medicine. You are liberated in every moment when you dance what is. Just bring yourself and wear clothes you can move in comfortably. Beginners welcome- If your heart beats, you can dance!
print_description: Dancing Freedom

title: DancingFreedom: Love Your Shadow w/ White Calf
description:
DancingFreedom: Love Your Shadow w/ White Calf

An ecstatic, somatic, dance journey to awaken your body, heart and mind and reconnect you to your inner dance shaman.

We will journey deep into the inner chambers of our body, heart and spirit to retrieve those parts of ourselves that we have hidden from, abandoned, suppressed or felt ashamed of. With Love and Compassion we will reclaim these parts of ourselves to create space for the light to seep in, to heal, reveal and reconnect us with the totality of who and what we are. We gather in safe and sacred way to dance our way to wholeness and freedom. In a Dancing Freedom practice we layer dance, music, breath, intent, energy, prayer and mindfullness within a single practice for inspiration, liberation and participation.  It is a free-form ecstatic, somatic & shamanic movement prayer ~ a community oriented method of dance therapy, a sacred practice & a soul return ~ friendly for all ages, abilities and bodies.
