title: Darkside of the Moon - Night Spankings
description:
Spank the night away, or part of it at least with Otis Spankmore within the privacy of our Spanking Dome. What better way to be spanked than under black light? What better way to participate at Burning Man than to get not only a spanking from one of our camp members. All spankticipants must be 18 years of age or older**. We have a variety of tools to spank you with and a crew of trained fun loving campers to help you out. We are here for a fun experience, not to bruise your bum (unless that’s what you really want). 

*we may substitute out pre-made in the event of equipment difficulties or other logistic issues that arise.
** we reserve the right to ask for ID when in doubt of your age.

Otis’ FAQ:
Q: How hard do I have to get spanked? 
A: How hard do you want to be spanked?

Q: Can I spank my friend or have my friend spank me?
A: Yes.

Q: Do I have to be bare bottomed in order to be spanked?
A: No, but you can if you wish to be.

Q: How many spanks do I need to take in order to get a cookie?
A: At least one.

Q: Can I get a cookie without being spanked?
A: No, you must participate.


Q: Can I get a spanking and not take a cookie?
A: Yes.

Q: Do you have vegan or gluten free cookies?
A: We may have some pre-baked ones on hand while supplies last, no guarantee.
print_description: It's the dark side of the moon (i.e. your bum) at Otis Spankmore in Silicon Village. Get your cookies and evening spankings from us! All in good fun!

title: Dark Sparkle Burlesque: In Lust we Trust
description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation. Contact: nickisparxx@gmail.com

title: Dawn of the Burning Sun concert
description: Experiencing the divine and magical sunrises on the playa is beyond words can describe. While we can’t escape the loud dance music in the morning, many dayburners (burners who are more focus on the daytime activities) are seeking solitude at the dawn of the day. NYC director/composer Dayburn (Charlie Wan) will be performing his original cinematic score at Black Rock Observatory (designed by 2013 Temple designer Gregg Fleishman) to accompany your deep connecting moment with the most important star in our universe - the Sun. There will be live visual projection of the sun from solar telescope by astrophysicist Matt O'Dowd. Any art cars with sound systems and FM radio receivers are welcomed to participate our additional immersive simulcast soundscape experience. There will be a small numbers of radio receivers available to be borrowed at the event. The concert starts at the first ray of light on friday morning (August 29, 6am). Bring your open heart and look to the east.
print_description: NY’s composer Dayburn will be performing his original cinematic music journey with guests to accompany your serene sunrise at Black Rock Observatory

title: Deep connections thru Dayburners and 7 Sunrises
description: Experiencing sunrises on the playa is beyond words can describe. While we can’t escape the loud dance music in the morning, NYC director/composer Charlie Dayburn composed a 7-track Original cinematic soundtrack to accompany dayburners like us who are seeking solitude at the dawn of the day. The 7 tracks express 7 roller coaster feelings throughout the week. Charlie Dayburn would like to share the whole album with fellow dayburners through 7 different connection exercises from body contact to soul gazing. This album is also tuned to 432Hz which believes it's the vibrational frequency of our human bodies. It's an more inward experience that is felt inside the body at the spine and heart. Each attendee will receive a copy of the album.

title: Deep Listening
description: Come join us for a Deep Listening session on the playa.  Please bring a listening journal or something to write on. Deep listening directs our attention to sound and silence.  An objective is to feel the sharp contrast between the two forms of attention- the clear detail of a sound or sequence of sounds using focal attention and the expansion to multiple sources sounding simultaneously in multi-dimensions with global attention.

The Dancetronauts’ Strip Ship and Bass Station will be parked for an open playa dance party hosted at Embrace--80’ tall lovers locked in eternal love. What better way to live, love, laugh and dance than at this epic party towered by a symbolic art installation and surrounded by your favorite mutant vehicles!

The Bass Station lineup will include resident Dancetronaut DJs and several special guests. The evening will feature fire dancing and performances by our breath-taking bass kittens--the Dancetrohotties!

Immerse yourself in good vibes and deep BASS!

Special thanks to our friends at the Pier Group for so graciously lending us their massive and beautiful art installation!

Art cars and fire dancers interested in participating are encouraged to register. Registration is not mandatory, but will help us with placement. 
Register here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1MMiXq36r-ffM2_hX2dg5k-Vm04kn8tg0daIsV_oXgsA/viewform?usp=send_form

Tentative Lineup:
9 pm-10 pm: TBA
10 pm-11 pm: TBA
11 pm-1 am: Dancetronauts
1 am-2 am: Diva Danielle & Charlie Unicorn 
2 am-3 am: TBA
print_description: The Dancetronauts’ Strip Ship and Bass Station will be parked for an open playa dance party hosted at Embrace. Fire dancers and art cars welcome!

title: Derby in the Dust
description: Come watch the 8th Annual Black Rock City Roller Girls play roller derby at Burning Man on Thursday, August 28th, 2014 at 6pm. The Black Rock City Roller girls are a group of fast skating hard hitting and dusty women from around the world. Each year, in the desert of Nevada, we descend on our friends at the Black Rock Roller Disco to give the participants of The Burning Man Festival a wild show full of thrills, chills and dusty spills as sexy fierce women in quad roller skates knock each other around.
print_description: Roller derby players from around the world descend on the Disco Rink for a wild show full of thrills, chills & dusty spills. Come cheer on your team!

title: Desert 2 Desert Tent
description: Come visit Spice n Vice - our second year on the playa. We will be located at 6:45 and Ephesus. We are open 12-3:30 p.m daily! Try some ice cold chai, delicious Arabic coffee, or milky sweet Indian hot chai. Come experience our Desert to Desert bedouin hospitality tent - scents, sounds, and flavors from the Orient. Our eclectic group of burners from the Middle East, China, Europe, and US are happy to share stories of travel and give sage advice to those seeking world wide adventures. https://www.facebook.com/SpiceNVice

Greet the morning, and let the smell of our freshly baked bread draw you into our oasis, where mint tea, joy, music and performance will soothe your soul and nourish your body.

Every morning the Lovin' Oven will be baking hot & steamy tuscan flat bread, topped, garnished and spread to your satisfaction.

Come rise to the occasion with the hot disco stylings of DJ Doctor I and special daily guests:

Tuesday: DJ Doctor I presents Karen Carpenter Lite Brunch

Wednesday: DJ Doctor I presents the Burt Bacharach vs Barry Gibb Beat Down

Thursday: Captain Kirk's Steamy Smorgasbord

Friday: the Olivia Newton Elton John Xanadu Rocketman Breakfast

Saturday: Robot Heart After Party: Dreamy Electro Brunch with DJ Ian Bender

Sunday: Disco Brunch aboard the Love Boat with DJ Doctor I

Bring your Future Best Friend (FBF), share the story of how you met on the Playa, and get your Burning Man Best Friend necklaces! You know this is the beginning of something amazing. Recognize it, bitches!

title: DMV Happy Hour
description:
Mutant Vehicle owners and aficionados; You are cordially invited to join the DMV Hotties in celebrating the end of another amazing day at the Department of Mutant Vehicles. This is a great opportunity to meet the Hotties as well as many of Black Rock City's talented Mutant Vehicle creators. Bring your night-licensed MV and party with us as we raise a glass or two to in honor of Black Rock City's fantastic art on wheels. This is a great time to see loads of MV's together in their nighttime splendor.  This party is THE place to catch a ride on one of the Mutant Vehicles as they drive off to parts unknown for the rest of the night. 
This event is open to all citizens of BRC.
print_description: The DMV Hotties invite you to join us in celebration of BRC's amazing mobile art! Come raise a glass with the DMV crew & meet Mutant Vehicle creators.

title: DNA Extraction and Necklace Making
description: Camp Dark Sparkle will help you acquire your own DNA and turn it into art that can be worn or gifted. Our camp challenges the citizens of BRC to find mystery and beauty in themselves and others, and celebrate the unique Dark Sparkle in all of us. DNA contains the instructions for making each of us unique and after this workshop you’ll walk away with a piece of your own DNA that you can both see and touch. DNA extraction by painless cheek swab. Suitable for (supervised) children.
print_description: DNA contains instructions for making us unique! Dark Sparkle will help you painlessly acquire your DNA and turn it into wearable art. Kids welcome!

title: "Doing it Right" Tours
description: Have you ever wondered how you can have the best camp ever? Come see how Recycle Camp is Doing it Right and you can, too! With a tour from Scraps of the Recycle Camp setup for maximum fun and minimum epic fails, get some inspiration on how you can make next year the best year ever. Before you leave, get some sweet gifties to get you started on making your camp a clean, green, good times machine.
print_description: Have you ever wondered how you, too can have the best camp ever? Come see how Recycle Camp is Doing it Right and you can, too!

title: Dominance & submission 101
description: Have you fantasized about submitting to your partner or possibly taking charge in the bedroom? Or perhaps you’ve tried it and want to learn more. We’ll cover both sides of a variety of power-exchange relationships through demos and discussion. 18+, ID req.
print_description: For those who want to submit or take charge - we’ll cover both the submissive & dominant sides of power-exchange relationships. 18+, ID req.

title: DO NOT AWAKEN The Alien Siege Machine!
description: DO NOT AWAKEN THE ALIEN SIEGE MACHINE! The deluded "Believers" have built this LETHAL ALIEN TECHNOLOGY and are imperiling our entire planet in the process. Iterations of this monstrosity have brought destruction to humanity for eons - research it for yourself! It must be stopped, so please come to our call to ACTION at dusk to stop the insanity, or all will be lost!
print_description: DO NOT AWAKEN THE ALIEN SIEGE MACHINE! This is a call to ACTION at dusk to stop the deluded "Believers"! Stop the insanity, or all will be lost!

More bees the buzzier! We provide you with antennae if you need them!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ivOU-dkWtdY
print_description: Swing by the BuzzInn in your finest bee gear and do the waggle dance with us!  More bees the buzzier! We provide you with antennae if you need them!

title: Doubles: Twin Hooping
description: Do you suffer from Hoop Envy? Do you look across the playa at those bitches with two hoops… they be tossing 'em and weaving 'em and there you are with your one hoop wishing for more? or do you have two hoops that you continue to mercilessly batter your face in with futile attempts to work the twins? Ok… so maybe none of this shit is true and you just want to tighten your twin skills… well look no further - Megan Michelle - aka Liscious - is here to show you that you too can make others envious of your twin skills – learn how to weave, toss, and transition your way smoothly with your twin hoops. You better “be-weave” you will learn something new!
print_description: Megan Michelle teaches rad twin hoop skills – learn to weave, toss, and transition your way smoothly with your twin hoops. You better “be-weave”!

title: Douchecon
description:
You can't beat 'em, so join 'em! Become a douche-for-a-day and apologize to nobody! Pop your collars and come by The Friends of Jerome camp for some fireball and Jagermeister shots.  We'll have a little douche-dance-off, fist bump each other and go out on a little parade for douche-freedom on the playa.   

Now is your chance to liberate your inner douche.  We will test the limits of radical inclusion on the playa alright.  We will be noisy, obnoxious, drunken assholes and demand free drinks and food at all the bars and camps in our way while texting our friends and updating our status on Facebook.  If you have a gong, bullhorn, or other obnoxious noisemaker, bring it with you and add the douchery!  

Are you a real douche?  Come by and show us how it's done brah!

And don't forget your cell phone, douche!
print_description: You can't beat 'em, so join 'em! Become a douche-for-a-day and apologize to nobody! Dress, drink and dance like a douche with us.  It's liberating.

description: Hey, y'all! Ready to fluff your fur and baa like the wolves are out of town? Get your shanks over to BAAAHS Station, everyone’s homo-home on the range, for a thrown down, deep house Ho Down. Get down with BAAAHS, the Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep and his furry flock for a barn-raising afternoon. Black Sheep, VIP Rear Entry! Chaps and go-go shorts encouraged.
print_description: Howdy! Come on down to BAAAHS Station for a barn-raising, throw down, deep house Ho Down! Black Sheep, VIP Rear Entry! Don't be sheepish- we want ewe!

title: Dream Theater Ritual Actions
description: Dream Theater Action:  a dream workshop. We recreate your dream by casting people in it and a dreamer evolves every image in a dream.  Questions let the dream play out. w/ Anastasia Konkina.  Everyone has to have a dream they had recently or from childhood that is vivid and potent. Something that left an impact/impression on them I would say. a dreamer becomes every image in a dream and I would ask questions and the purpose of it is to let the dream speak through a dreamer. a dream workshop with 6 to 10 people tops.

title: Educational Series
description:
Retrofrolic provides educational activities, lectures, demonstrations, workshops, conferences, meetings, written materials and electronic materials for individuals in alternative lifestyles and relationships. Retrofrolic provides skills and technique training and mentorship to like-minded individuals. Retrofrolic teaches the practice of safe, sane and consensual sexual activities in personal relationships and promotes safe sex practices.

Retrofrolic is based in Ventura, California. We are organized as a nonprofit corporation. Our geographically diverse staff enjoys bringing information and learning opportunities to the Central Coast of California as a transportable source of education and development for the LGBTQ and BDSM communities.  Join us as we share our experience and knowledge each afternoon.  Please check our sign board for the topics of the day

title: Einstein, You and the Universe
description:
The art of being Human with Richard Kent Green (Einstein).
Explore the infinite nature of your humanity - journey out to the edge of the universe and into yourself.

A three-part exploration: physical/mental/spiritual. 
Focusing the Physical Body thru Head & Neck Exercise / Eye-Gazing / Massage.
Focusing the Mental Body thru an Awareness Reverie.
Focusing the Spiritual thru Psychosynthetic Affirmation / Meditation.

Why it all works - consciousness as "godness".
print_description: Explore the infinite nature of your humanity - journey out to the edge of the universe and into yourself. Why it all works.

title: Elbow Appreciation Day
description:
Ever stop to think about how lucky you are that you fold your arms in half without breaking them? Flexible elbows are way more important than opposable thumbs and we never think twice about them. That all ends with Elbow Appreciation Day.
Come with your elbows splinted straight for an afternoon of drinks, snacks, and discussions of our body's most under-rated part. Limited supply of splits will be provided to those without.
Fair warning: You might need to find someone to feed you since you won't be able to reach your own mouth.

The EL-UV Collider and Levitation Scope is an interactive kaleidoscope.
The Levitation Scope is in the center of the Collider, a 16 foot diameter octagon shaped structure lit with UV paintings.  All Burners will be invited to ride this kaleidoscope that both sways from side to side and revolves 360 degrees. title: Embodied Orgasm ~ EFT w/ Sonya Sophia
description:
Sonya Sophia is a gifted empath, master level healer and “Love Activist” with 25 years of experience in the healing arts. She is the founder of The Sophia School of Living Arts, an online healing school that produces The World Tapping Circle. This is a 90-minute, life enhancing, interactive Tapping experience within a global, online community Sonya teaches physical and emotional healing using EFT, Emotional Freedom Technique or Tapping, as a foundational practice giving people a visceral experience for their real-time transformation. Those who’ve studied with her now bring the healing gift of EFT to their own families and communities. She brings feminine wisdom, deep love, loads of laughter plus life-changing releases to audiences and workshop participants worldwide. Her mission is to support the healing of humanity and facilitate Heaven on Earth.

Her standing-room only workshops have been offered in the UK, France, Italy, the Netherlands, Germany and all over the United States, from California to New York City. As a guest speaker at the International Alchemy Conference, Leaders Causing Leaders Conference and the Conscious Life Expo, she’s brought the miracle of Tapping to ever expanding audiences. Sonya continues to teach at Transformational Festivals, including her two favorites – The Rainbow Gathering for over 20 years and Burning Man for the last 7 years.

Sonya Sophia invented and published the format for EFT Circles, now widely practiced throughout the world. She has created recordings to help people come to life, activate Divine Purpose and step into their true power.

title: Embrace Pas de Deux
description: Conceived and choreographed to accompany the 'Embrace' sculpture, 'Embrace Pas de Deux' illustrates the act of falling in love as described through the art of classical and contemporary ballet. This eclectic dance piece explores the concept of accessing the Divine through romantic Love.  It explores concepts of Divine Love by moving forward through history from Ancient Egypt, to the Classical period, and culminating in the present.  The 25 minute piece includes audience lead group song and the sharing of personal intentions of Love. Embrace Pas de Deux features Sierra Nevada Ballet principal dancers Ananda Bena-Weber and Alexander Biber. The piece features the diverse choreographic styles of Rosine Bena, Horacio Cefuentes, and Ananda Bena-Weber.
print_description: Sierra Nevada Ballet, presents this pas de deux illustrates the spiritual act of falling in love as described through classical & contemporary ballet.

description:
We know you need a playa wedding, even if you're already married or confirmed singleton.  Thanks to Hardly, now you can have one. Gather your friends and come get Hardly Married! Group ceremony to be held in the Hardly Hotel Ballroom.

Ladies: we’ll have white lace to fashion your veils. Gentlemen: we’ll have black lace to fashion your tails. Single? Coupled? In a threesome? A group? It’s all good.  Plural of spouse is spice; any combination of fiancé(es) welcome. We'll marry you off any way you want.

Wedding rings to be provided.  Ordained ministers available.

Celebratory toasts and liquid courage available in our Saloon. This is Hardly, so we'll have whiskey in lieu of champagne.  Maybe we'll have bubbly whiskey!

Marriages are null and void off the Playa, unless you have a valid marriage license, in which case it's your problem.

title: Evolutionary Economics: The Future of Capitalism
description: Capitalism is often seen as the problem. Can it be part of the solution? Can capitalism wake up and become conscious, before it's all too late? Is Conscious Capitalism adequate for a sustainable society indefinitely? Or is it a transitional step on the way to Post Capitalism? Join several theorists and critics of conscious, awake capitalism for a rousing discussion on the relationship between capitalism and the future of the planet.Facilitated by Ali Shanti, David Hassell, Daniel Schmactenberger, Steven Starr and more.

title: Evolutionary Feminine Leadership
description: The Dalai Lama has said that "The world will be saved by the western woman." A tidal-shift is happening in the West, with repercussions for the whole world. What is "feminine leadership" and how does it differ from "masculine leadership"? Facilitated by Jennifer Russell, Stacey Morgenstern, LiYana Silver, Ali Shanti, and more.

title: Face & Break a Bad Habit
description:
There’s no getting around having your parent’s issues and personality—you just have your own version. You created yourself based on them. This is not based on how the world saw your parents or they saw themselves, but how YOU saw them. You are a reaction to your mother and father.

Our goal is to help you understand and address your parents, so that you do not repeat or relive their lives and issues. Understanding will enable you to intervene with yourself and design yourself and your life.  We will give you the tools you need to break a bad behavior/habit in 6 weeks.

title: Fags & Fathers - Queer Temple Healing Ritual
description: Most gay men struggle with father issues. These wounds often prevent gay men from being completely intimate, often feeling rejected, not good enough or abandoned. It's impossible to live authentically when your internal relationship with your father is compromised. This ritual serves to transform those wounds into sources of strength and compassion, allowing participants to fully embrace themselves, live authentically and experience deep, committed intimate relationships with themselves and other men. Held at the Queer Temple at Comfort & Joy.
print_description: Most gay men struggle with father issues. This ritual serves to transform those wounds into sources of strength and compassion to live authentically.

title: Free Photography Zone
description:
For 18 years the Free Photography Zone has photographed and given prints to the participants of Burning Man.
In a studio setting, using professional studio equipment you are photographed and preserved as you were during this life changing event.
Each person photographed is given a print as a tangible and permanent reminder of their time at Burning Man.
Sometimes you are directed, sometimes not.  This is your experience and I try to make it a lasting memory of your time here.
Individuals, groups, families (in all permutations) are welcome.
I usually begin in the mid to late morning and continue photographing till the late night.  Or until I can no longer stand and photograph.
So come early in the week, bring your friends and enjoy the rather unique experience of really being photographed.  It is not something to be missed.
print_description: Free Photography Zone, the studio on the Playa to have your portrait done and receive a print to remember your Burning Man experience.

title: [freespace] around the Globe
description: What happens when you get a building for $1 and give it to the community to run?...  [freespace]   The experiment started in June of 2013 and has quickly spread to cities around the world. A [freespace] is a gathering place for people to come together, to create, teach, learn, and share the things which they are truly passionate about, and strengthen connections between individuals and communities through art, events, and long term projects. Anything goes as long as it is both free and inclusive like an urban version of the “permission engine” on the playa. Currently there are 8 open [freespaces] in 6 cities on 4 continents. There are communities developing in 26 locations and 18 different countries around the world. [freespace] co-founders and organizers from around the world will host an information session, discussing the [freespace] model and facilitating Q&A. Help bring the playa ethos back to your community.

title: French Maid Brigade Parade
description: Too much dust from your caravansary around the playa? Time to put the bizarre in their bazaar. Join us in uniform with your non-feather duster and your worst possible French accent. You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa. Rendezvous with us! Please bring: non-feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, any other useful cleaning equipment, and your worst possible French accent. On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!

title: Funk and fashion: A Soul Evolution Soirée
description:
Title:  Funk and fashion: A Soul Evolution Soirée 

In the tarot, each individual soul is represented by the The Fool.   We are all Fools in the journey we call life.   The 22 major arcana cards represent the different stages of evolution we all encounter on our way to seeking enlightenment.   Join us for this very special, tarot themed fashion show as Pouncy takes you on this journey of soul evolution seeking enlightenment, visually displayed though burner fashions. Following the show, get your groove on with some funk-tified frequencies that will have you vibrating in the higher realms.

title: Gay Meet & Greet
description: Black Rock City's LGBTQQ community kicks off the week in festive rainbow colors with libations, music and an exchange of info on the week's gay-oriented events. This premier annual opening-night gathering for the Playa's Gay/Bi/Curious Burners and their friends is hosted by Down Low Club Camp in memory of Mario Cisneros, founder of the event. Come meet new friends, reaquaint with those from past Burns, spark a new Playa romance or rekindle one from the past. Gather with your LGBTQQ brothers and sisters to learn where they are camped and what events they've got planned for the week on the Playa. Don't forget to bring a flyer or other info about your gay-oriented events to post on our LGBTQQ Community Bulletin Board.

title: Gemini's Bacon, Bloody Marys, & Bottom Biscuits!
description:
It's back! How hot can you take it? Spicy, savory, and DEFINITELY alcoholic, join us at 3:45 & D for even more bacon, even bloodier marys, and some lovely bottoms for all to view (ask before you fondle!)! Bring your own cup to 3:45 & D for the best*, hottest*, and TASTIEST* bloody marys and goodies on the Playa!
.
(* dustiest; let's not kid ourselves.)
.
There are usually other food goodies available, as we see fit and depending on how drunk we got the night before/that morning.
.
We'll also have our famous Hydration Station for those who aren't drinking or for those under 21 (because they can all still eat BACON, right?! Shush, it's a rhetorical question.)
.
Also revisit the ARE YOU A BLOODY PUSSY OR WHAT? bar, and see how hot you can take it when Gemini pours whatever the hell she damn well feels like into a shot glass for you to drink. Want to earn YOUR red wings?!
.
Have a seat in our living room, play in the photo booth or on the trampoline (clothing optional, of course!), or get your Playa Portrait done by our resident  photog!
.
Bring your friends, bring your family, and BRING YOUR OWN FREAKING CUP! 
.
3:45 & D
.
Fuck your burn! See you on the Playa!

title: gerflash1
description: In May, we took this idea to Toastmasters International Executive Secretary, Dan Rex, and he liked it, so we said “Let’s do it!” If you’re a Toastmaster and can’t be in Malaysia for their International Convention, then bring your CC, CL, and any other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting and photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, so being on time is a very good thing.  Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit. And just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll be Toastmastering on-Playa with other Toast-Burners, while some of your TM peeps are conventioning in Kuala Lumpur!

title: Gift An Argument
description: Would you like to gift an argument? Do you enjoy playing devil's advocate, or just "taking the piss?" Are you a good sport about it? Forget everything you ever thought you learned in high school debate (or recapture some of that defiant juvenile spirit), and sharpen your point-making skills with our semi-formal argument contests. Topics will vary, and can be drawn from a hat, assigned to you at random by a Narwhal, or brought with you. Bringing your own topics and debate opponents is highly encouraged! Our judges and peanut gallery will be on-hand to ensure an optimal level of political incorrectness, smartassery, fun, and general chaotic entertainment.

title: "Give Cthulhu A Call" Happy Hour
description:
In the great tradition of Colorado bringing Lovecraftian horror to the playa, please join the Narwhals as we reach out and touch Cthulhu's tentacular appendage. We will be serving cold and tasty Cthul-Aid (one cup per cultist), Cheesy-Poofs, Monkey Chants, Creepy Sounds, Tribal Dance, and whatever else we can use to (*fingers crossed*) release unholy TERROR that will devour us all and usher in a wondrous Aeon of darkness.
We all know that the Great Cthulhu is a colossal cephalopodic God that sleeps *almost* eternally in the Pacific Ocean. It’s gonna take a TREMENDOUS amount of noise and participation to wake him up! Do well to remember our chant "Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn," and feel free to bring your old alarm clocks, drums, pot n pans, virgin sacrifices, and other foul offerings that might entice the tuckered slimy one to stir from his slumber. Don't forget to bring a towel!
print_description: Drink the Cthul-Aid and touch Cthulhu's tentacular appendage. Feel free to bring old alarm clocks, drums, pot n pans, virgin sacrifices and a towel.

title: Heart Circle
description: The North American First Nations regarded the circle as the main symbol for understanding life's mysteries. They have observed that all of life was circular movement which could be seen everywhere throughout nature. Man looked out on the physical world through their eyes, which is circular. The Earth is round, and so is the Sun, Moon and planets. The rising and setting of the Sun follows a circular motion. The seasons form a circular movement. Birds build their nests in circles. Animals marked their territories in circles. In the old days, tribes lived in circular homes called tepees and their communities were arranged with the tepees in a circle. Indeed, to the Natives, the whole of life appeared to be circular.
print_description: a very soul cleansing opportunity to share and grow with your community. Each person will get a chance to express their feelings.

Joy is a very gentle Hatha Yoga class that holds poses longer and works with relaxing the entire body, while bringing awareness to all the muscles, joints, veins, tissues and organs. It also uses the breath to go deeper into opening restricted areas in the body and exploring the benefits of meditation. A truly joyful experience.

title: Heavenly Yoga - Paradise
description: Paradise is a series of 26 poses. Most Yoga poses (asanas) are performed twice and held for a minute or 30 seconds. Heat is created in the body and used to allow the muscles to go deeper and safer into the poses. It eliminates the risk of injuries, promotes sweating and helps to release toxins. This class uses the same routine every time. Hot Yoga is a way to experience paradise on earth.

title: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Night Tea Ceremony
description: The art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. His Red Tea Ceremony will be taken place at Japan Souk "Kanji Dojo" at Burning Man. This performance was inspired by and arranged from the Japanese traditional tea ceremony. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please simply drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thought toward him for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make better and more enjoyable future throughout this tea ceremony.
print_description: The art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. His Red Tea Ceremony will be taken place at Japan Souk "Kanji Dojo" at Burning Man.

title: High Chair Stilt BAR cocktail party
description:
WE want to honor the amazing neighbor camps we've had over the years by dressing up as them--- no seriously we love these  dark souls (with kitten hearts)  of Death Guild! It's our traditional Sunset, Stilting, Costume, Cocktail party!  5-8PM
Bring out your inner goth… or your inner Mad Max… these are the guys who run THUNDERDOME and they've been our neighbors in many years past… We hope we'll get an influx of them for Thursday night… which could be quite a party! MUSIC: INDUSTRIAL. ***STILTERS*** come mingle with other giant ilk of your kind -- Enhightened Beings of Leisure - on Playa since the mid 2000's. and all you NON-STILTERS-- come gaze up in wonder at how they don't just topple over--indeed marvel at how they prance and pivot on those long long "legs" (the secret is their rock hard asses)...maybe get inspired to get high! brought to you by ENHIGHTENED BEINGS OF LEISURE and PedalBump, aka PB/EBOL SANDWICH CAMP.

title: Higher Self Invocation & Intention Setting
description: We will gather in a circle promptly at 11:00 for this simple, yet powerful ritual.  As a group, we will invoke our Higher Selves...calling the best parts of yourself to be present.  Then you will set an intention for the day.  This may be something like "my intention is to share my deepest love today" or "my intention is to hug as many people as I can today" or "my intention is to express myself fully to everyone I meet today".  Then at the end of the day, you can reflect on how your day was different or shaped due to this exercise...and you will have another tool at your disposal.  Repeating this everyday will increase your personal power.
print_description: Join us promptly at 11:00 for a simple, yet powerful ritual.  We will call the best parts of ourselves to be present and set an intention for the day.

Join the boys of Homojitoville for our 10th year on the Playa & guzzle down our bottomless icy fresh Playa Famous Homojitos while dancing to groovy beats with words!

Come join us for a Delicious Dusty Daytime Drink and a Dirty Dance! Unleash your inner HOMO!!!

A mirage appears in Deep Playa. The aroma of fresh, icy Homojitos stimulates your hypothalamus. Giant, bright, puffy flowers belt out groovy dance beats. Leave it to serendipity and the boys of Homojitoville! Always on the move, the Mobile Homojito Dance Bar and Sound Garden of Eden appears randomly, erupting in a fabulous cocktail & dance party oasis, then disappears. Never in the same place twice, this is no mirage. Shake your groove thing where spontaneity rules! Bring us your cup, we’ll fill it with love!

title: How to Argue (Productively) with Anyone
description: Don't you just love a good argument? In this workshop, we'll go over some tips and tricks that will help you turn a unsatisfying fight into a productive exchange of ideas and feelings, and then we'll practice what we've learned with some playa specific roleplaying scenarios.

title: How to be a feminist in the bedroom
description:
In this workshop, we will explore feminist sexuality and how it creates more intimate and pleasurable sexual encounters. Learn to feel comfortable and empowered saying no, and how to find your true yes. Explore your desires and practice asking for what you want. Consider the ways in which we can take pleasure into our own hands. Discover how self-awareness and skilled communication can lead to deeper intimacy and increased pleasure. All exercises are optional and designed to have you feel safe and empowered. This workshop is open to singles and couples, folks of all genders and sexual orientations welcome. 

This workshop is designed and led by Ali Fogarty, a doctoral candidate in Sociology at Stanford University specializing in sex, gender, and sexuality. You can find out more about the work she does at www.ackfogarty.com
print_description: Learn to feel sexually empowered! Explore your desires & practice asking for what you want. For singles, couples, all genders & sexual orientations.

title: Individual Meditation Workshop; Guided
description:
We've all tried to meditate on our own… we get distracted, an a million things come into our mind and we end up not achieving what we set out to do. With Guided mediations we learn how to use voice and story to guide the body and mind into complete relaxation. When we're on the playa there are so many things going through our heads and we need to quiet the mind and feel grounded to start the day and eventually focus on our intentions while out in the desert.

In Individual guided meditation with Bobby Hedglin Taylor everyone will learn how to follow a guided meditation and experience relaxation on a deep subconscious level to shake off the every day cares and woes! You'll leave with the tools to create your own meditations and those used in class will be gifted to you to use back in the muggle world via youtube. :) You're also welcome to record the meditations we use in class to use again and again!

I can't promise enlightenment or nirvana, but I can promise a great, peaceful hour on the playa and take you to another world of deep relaxation!

Namaste

Bobby Hedglin Taylor

See also https://www.facebook.com/events/781521991887385/?ref=4#
print_description: Individual guided meditation everyone will learn how to follow and experience relaxation on a deep subconscious level.

title: In Search of the Truth (The Truth Booth)
description:
In Search of the Truth (The Truth Booth)
is an installation comprised of a touring, portable, inflatable ‘Truth Booth’ that embarked on a world tour at the Galway Arts Festival, Ireland in 2011 . The exterior is iconically shaped like a giant cartoon speech bubble with the word ‘TRUTH’ printed on the side. The interior acts much like a photo booth, but serves to compile 2 minute long video responses from the public. Once seated inside people are invited to record their opinions and thoughts as they finish the statement: “The truth is...”. 

Throughout this long-term project the video footage will be compiled and edited into a video installation. To expand and engage with audiences, the movements of The Truth Booth and sample responses will also be tracked, edited, and categorised on a dedicated website. Ultimately, the goal of this project is to try to capture as many definitions, confessions and thoughts on The Truth as possible, creating a diverse ‘portrait’ of people across the globe. 

The Cause Collective is a team of artists, designers and ethnographers creating innovative art in the public realm. Their projects explore and enliven public spaces by creating a dynamic conversation between issues, sites and the public audience. By exploring ideas that affect and shape society, they seek to add the ‘public’ back into public space and art.
print_description: The Truth Booth is an inflatable, self-guided video recording booth touring the world seeking an answer to the statement "the Truth is . . ."

title: Introvert Awareness for Introverts and Extroverts
description: Have you noticed how much we hear about introverts and extroverts in the media and in everyday conversation these days?  Do you know which one you are? Are you clear on what these terms really mean?  Susan Cain has written a fantastic book called Quiet:The Power of Introverts in a World That Can’t Stop Talking.  Her Ted Talk has been viewed over 9,000,000 times!  Susan maintains that our society is set up to favor and promote extroverts. Yet it’s estimated that over a third of us are introverts.  Introverts sometimes feel devalued and not aware of the unique gifts they have to share with all of us. Through a combination of lecture, group discussion, and experiential activity, you will learn how introversion and extroversion are defined.  You will learn how being an introvert can impact on your family and work life.  You will learn how to become more sensitive to the needs of both introverts and extroverts. You will learn how to find out more about introverts and extroverts.
print_description: Introverts sometimes feel devalued and not aware of the unique gifts they have to share with all of us.

title: Jewish Motherly Advice
description: Lisa Schroeder of the Children of Chaos will be hosting her Jewish Mother booth again this year, dispensing advice and nurturing for all.  “The Jewish Mother You Never Had” will be available daily and Mom's hours will be posted in front of the camp.   Mama Lisa will be providing cookies, milk, (maybe even a bagel!) and lots of love and caring for Burners requiring a little TLC - in English, Hebrew, Yiddish, French, and/or Spanish.   The 2009 version of this event won the Acculturation Video award from Burning Man (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dtX8Z-izffs\).  As Mama Lisa says, "everyone needs motherly advice, but who wants to hear if from their own mother?...oy, too much baggage!"  Come visit with Burning Man's very own Jewish Mother who dispenses love, nurturing, advice and no guilt (unless absolutely necessary).
print_description: Everyone needs a mother, though not always one's own.  Get motherly advice and answers to any burning question from the Jewish Mother, Mamawitz.

title: Karl Baba- Shamanic Death and Rebirth
description:
Karl Baba will guide participants in a "Shamanic Death and Rebirth" ceremony to make peace with life and let go of the inner baggage that weighs on our heart. 

We call in the Spirit of the Rainforest Medicine with a ritual drink of water and Palo Santo scent. Come prepared to lie down or sit and envision this is your last day on the planet. You have an opportunity to make peace with your life and everyone who has touched you, to surrender, to forgive, and emerge freshly into a new life.

Facing death can be the medicine to embrace the transformation that these powerful times offer.

title: KognitoKhan
description: Each morning and evening we invite you to meditate at the feet of the mighty KognitoKhan. Standing 30' tall, the 6-armed, 6-legged desert pharos features pyro kinetic hands at the end of each outstretched arm, beckoning adventurers and seekers of truth from afar to the lodestar in the dusty sky. As we gather at the feet of the mighty KognitoKhan, we meditate on the pure spirit of universal love and wisdom. Using brainwave-oracles to channel our kognitive energy, we invoke the Jinn of dusty places to energize the cosmic force, producing a fiery prayer-ring-of-hands as the transubstantiation builds to zenith and a host of spirits can be felt infusing the desert with excitement and anticipation, until the mental power of the entire Khan brings forth an eruption of fireballs, rising into the sky as a beacon of Kognitive Kommunion. Come use your mental energy to control fireballs!

title: Kostume Gifting Experience
description: Let Kostume Kult transform you with a new costume or accessory! Costume experts dress you & send you dancing down the runway. Silliness guaranteed. Kostume Kult recreates the glory days of NYC circa the 1970's by transporting you to the seedy throwback replica of "Times Square BRC". The Empire State Building and 25ft King Kong loom above the NYC skyline while a runway show that blows fashion week out of the dust goes on street level starring you. As a premiere daytime destination, Kostume Kult will be providing costume transformations to the under-accessorized masses of BRC. No person shall go uncostumed or unfabulous because we have a full team of costume stylists ready to dress you up and help you transform. The only thing we ask of you is a proud strut down our runway to display your new duds to booty moving music. If you prefer a DIY approach, step inside our Krafting Dome where you can gain the supplies and know-how to upgrade your bike and your look. Our professional staff knows their way around a glue gun and we're not afraid to bedazzle YOU! The playa provides the grit, we supply the glamour so hop the K Train to costume transformations, music and a non stop runway show that would make RuPaul blush. Of course the city never sleeps and our amazing DJ line up keeps us moving into the night as the city lights shine bright into the dark playa night. Also not to be missed is the Peepshow FreaKKshow, BRC's only 24 hour participatory peep show where you can be the star or simply sneak a peek at some Big Apples! Down our alleys you will find costumes, crafting, sparkle pony vagrants, playa hustlers, burner working gals and street wise tramps. You won't want to miss it so jump the turnstile to the KKrossroads Of The World. After all if you can make it here you can make it anywhere!
print_description: Let Kostume Kult transform you with a new costume or accessory! Costume experts dress you & send you dancing down the runway. Silliness guaranteed.

title: Kundalini Yoga
description: Kundalini Yoga is an Ancient Indian Practice to Calm The Nervous System. If you follow the instructions and do your best for 70 minutes including a 10 minute healing corpse pose you will feel the clear light of your consciousness shining through . Most of the class the Eyes are shut to cultivate and connect to inner awareness while moving the body in rhythm with the Breath. Repetitive Sounds allow the the tongue to "slap" the Upper Palate Releasing Pineal Gland Happy Hormones !  The balancing effects often last 24 hours enjoying the Fully Connected All in Place Feeling .... Kundalini Yoga replaces Attitude with Altitude . We say " The Breath is King of the Mind, the Mind Rules the Emotions so captain the Breath you'll Navigate the Emotions... & a Man without Rhythm is like a Land without Water. So come Kundalini...

title: Laughter Yoga
description: Start your evenings with the most intense laughter you can experience. We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. “Inappropriate” Laughter Yoga is also a possibility, if our clientele are okay with it. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!
print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness; experience the health benefits of good, long, & sometimes “inappropriate” laughter!

title: Learn to Dance Kizomba!
description:
Learn the basics to this fast-becoming popular dance from Angola & Cape Verde called Kizomba. Not to be confused with the Columbian-born latin workout program "Zumba", Kizomba is more like Tango mixed with other Latin dances like Salsa and Bachata. With proper top frames and booty-shaking bottoms and legs, this couple dance is becoming the most popular "latin" dance in Europe and USA, almost at par with Salsa and Bachata. Whether you're a couple or alone, there's always room for everyone to learn the basics and show of some new moves in the playa or in the default world. 
Facilitated by: E aka #DanceNinja at Camp Awesomeness
print_description: Salsa it is NOT! Learn to dance this sensual dance from Angola-looks like Tango but with HIPS like Bachata & Salsa.Couples encouraged.Singles welcome.

title: Learn to Hula Hoop

Ever thought about hula hooping?  Ever tried to keep one up and just couldn't?  

Come check out this learn to hula hoop class with some tips and tricks on how to keep it up. Anyone can learn to hoop with enough practice and motivation.  This class and the awesome, easy to use practice hoops, makes it so almost anyone can keep that hoop going!   

The number of hoops is limited so show up early to guarantee you'll get a practice hoop.
print_description: Come to the ARRRGH Bar to learn how to be a super duper hooper.  You'll be wiggle waggling that bootay to keep the hoop up and learn a trick or two.

title: Learn to Hula Hoop
description: Never could 'keep it up'? We'll make sure you're using the right sized hoop to learn all the basics and then some. We can teach  (almost) anybody in 10 minutes or less. We teach basic waist and body hooping but we're expecting lots of accomplished guest hoopers to be hanging out so if you want to learn more advanced moves - c'mon by. Classes are Monday-Thursday from 10 a.m. to noon but if we're there - we'll hoop with you.

title: LeeAnn Mallorie - Dancing Freedom
description:
Dancing Freedom is a global movement supporting liberation, community and leadership through the sacred medicine of dance. We are co-creating a global rEvolution, dancing towards a world in which all beings feel more at home, empowered, peaceful and free. 

Dancing Freedom blends conscious dance and the essence of medicine ceremony, taking you through an elemental wave of Earth, Water, Fire, Air and Ether. It's a safe and dynamic space to explore your own body sensations and emotions, while connecting with whole group consciousness. The ceremony begins with a powerful prayer for your life, and ends with a harvest circle where collective wisdom is shared.

title: LEOPARD MAFIA!
description: WEAR LEOPARD!!We made spotted magic at Afrika Burn now it is time to take this SPOT show on the road! BURNING MAN HERE WE COME!! PASS THIS EVENT ON! BE PART OF THE PROWL! Join the leap.Tell a friend to tell a friend. We are taking over the dusty plains of our beloved playa. Thursday Aug,28 is officially the first annual leopard day at Burning Man! Let's be honest people, leopard print is fuckin' PIMPIN (not to mention timeless,chic and undeniably fashionable)! Come one come all and show your spots!! Be a part of the " Leopard Mafiia". Wear your most ferocious spots from head to toe or just accent youself with leopard adornments. Growl and prowl while we frolick in complete and total leopard madness!!! Stalk your prey from the high grass or laze around in the sunshine and PURRRRRR.Enjoy how the other animals respond to you.This statement carries from day into evening. The more spots the better. Rock your spots from root to tip don't be scurrrrred y'all ! You know your inner Panthera pardus is just longing to come out ! title: Life Coaching
description:
Are you ready to change your life?  

Find love?
Fix a relationship?
Tell the truth?
Lose weight?
Create a new career?
Dismantle your excuses?
Be happy?
Take down your dark side?
Start dreaming again?
Stop limiting what's possible for yourself?
And LOVE your whole LIFE?

Guess what is standing in your way? YOU! And we're here to fix that. Like a chiropractor who adjusts your body, we adjust your life emotionally, mentally and spiritually, helping you see what's holding you back and giving you the tools to create the life you want.

As Michael Franti & Spearhead wrote in their song  "It's Never Too Late to start the day over."  Come to Camp IMAGINEnation between 12-4pm everyday and start your day fresh with a new perspective on who you are and what you want to make happen in your life.

Camp IMAGINEnation is a life coaching camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty. Our Life Coaches go through an extensive 2-year or more training process on life issues and human behavior. We know our shit and we walk our talk.  

We are available daily 12-4 to help you sort out your life. A conversation with one of our coaches will change YOU forever. It's up to you whether you choose to come down and take that first step.

Camp IMAGINEnation was founded by The Handel Group. 
The Handel Group was born of an authentic and ambitious desire to change the world in a very positive way. It is a spiritual endeavor for us. We fully respect and love the people we help because at HG, we all work on ourselves on a consistent basis as well. We think that those who are willing to dig deep and look at themselves honestly are the most courageous people in the world, not to mention, people we’d want to hang with. In a word, we are looking to make personal development cool. We think it is.
print_description: Professional life coaches available to advise you on any of your life stuff - relationships, career, bad habits, money, body...you name it, we fix it!

title: Living Fully Human...as the Cosmos Personifying
description:
Given the Mystery of the physical world explored through science, we need a corresponding spirituality that incorporates the profound insights of science, while including the Mystery of subjectivity found in spirituality and religion.
-	I propose that Cosmic Personification as a transformational identity shift that includes in Mystery, objective and subjective, and initiates and sustains conscious evolution in our lives. This shift brings the capacity for continuing our personal and social transformation.
-	I propose living fully human as the cosmos personifying as a viable spiritual meta-orientation. This would mean we intellectually, emotionally, perceptually recognize ourselves as the totality and as unique expressions of Universe. We are not separate from the Universe or each other, rather we are the Whole uniquely manifesting as these dynamic human forms. From this recognition, we shift our behavior individually and collectively to align with this deep insight into our identity. The workshop will introduce this framework and guide participants to practice, awaken, and sustain their unique cosmic embodiment for the sake of the Whole.
print_description: Living Fully Human...as the Cosmos Personifying

title: LNTV – Environmental Movies on the Playa
description: This week we’ll be sharing movies we’ve found funny, inspirational, positive and life changing.  We’ll be looking at themes like:  Less is the New More, and are No Impact, Zero Waste, and Carbon Neutral possible and feasible in our lives?  Will technology save us, or is it up to us to take the steps necessary to change our world, not to save our planet, but to save ourselves.  Come join us on this nightly journey when you want a respite from your journey in Black Rock City.  Our movie schedule will be available at our front desk

title: Longevity Stick
description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot yet, but clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for an early hour of low impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll have sticks available for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed the Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese Army. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain their health through LSA, and vowed that if he was ever freed, he would dedicate his life to spreading its benefits to the world, with the proviso that no future trainer could ever charge for the course. (Sounds like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, settled in Southern California, and started teaching classes of students and future teachers. Today, there are dozens of classes weekly around So Cal. Also, LSA is spreading around the US and world. Many more details are available at: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 Master Dao passed away late 2010 at age 89, and one of our camp was privileged to attend his funeral, and his last birthday party, a few months before.
print_description: Sun’s just up, not too hot, clothing is optional. 1 hr of lo impact exercise for balance & open points & channels. Bring H2O. We have sticks. Adults.

title: Losing Your Religion - Queer Temple Healing Ritual
description: Some people think religion is a way to control the ignorant masses. Others turn to religion for solace and direction. Religious dogma can serve to uplift and inspire or separate and control. This ritual will help you strip away the confining, controlling aspects of religion to live peacefully and harmoniously. Designed by a shaman and healer to guide those seeking freedom to safely strip away the parts and pieces of religious dogma that serves to limit self-expression and love.

title: Lucid Dreaming
description:
Lucid Dreaming (LD) is more popular since Inception came out. Come to this talk to learn more and share your experiences with like-minded people.

I've had lots of lucid dreams since discovering this interesting phenomena 22 years ago.  One of the most interesting things you can do is use lucid dreaming to have a dialogue with your own unconscious self.  

I hope to share the background of lucid dreaming and scientific basis (for those who care), then move to discuss the How-To and finally discuss some potential applications.

I hope the session will be interactive, so come ready to share your experiences, questions, concerns and ideas!

title: MAKE A FISH for the Debris installation
description:
Debris is an interactive, collaborative installation which is being created as a response to the problems presented by single use plastic.

The work reflects the literal problem of plastic in marine environments while offering a symbolic representation of the chemical body burdens carried by wildlife and humans alike. In presenting these issues, we are asked to consider misplaced notions of “disposability”, calling in to question consumer driven waste which has devalued what is in fact a very important material.

Participate: Make a Fish

Explore the Marine Food Web by drawing or painting a marine creature. A large array of fish, crustaceans, birds and mammals all make up the web and are all affected by chemical body burdens represented here by plastic. Think of how you can incorporate re-purposed material into your creature. This way, we can make use of that which is normally disposed of without second thought.

Send a .jpg of your piece to gallery420@gmail.com.
In doing so, you will be releasing your creature into the “ocean”.

 

The images are transferred onto repurposed materials like foamcore and are used as the base of interactive installations.These installations are set up in educational institutions and gallery exhibitions. Through the installation, people may learn about how we contribute directly to this problem, even if we live inland, and how we are directly impacted through the chemical body burdens we carry. Participants are introduced to solutions on how to reduce exposure to chemicals in their own lives and how to lessen the environmental impacts from the source.
Similar to the processing of material in the actual ocean, images will be replicated, transferred, redistributed, distressed, and reworked as the instillation is plugged into educational programming and handled by participants. 

http://virtualvoices.org/plastic
print_description: Part of a global collaboration on marine ecology in the Anthropocene, participants will make art that flows from water. Supplies provided.

description: A traveling altar is a small decorated box filled with sacred items that is compact and light enough for you to take with you on every business trip and vacation. You will practice using your new traveling altar through a guided chakra balancing meditation and a love activating visualization. Create sacred space wherever in the world you go with your traveling altar!

title: Mask Work with Tigre Bailando
description:
The Raven, the Haughty King, the Joyful Sprite, the Sorrowful Elder, the Wolf. . .
From animal spirits to emotive caricatures to the abstract and enigmatic "Neutral", explore the ancient and archetypal power of masks. An introduction to the theatrical and spiritual techniques of mask work, come join the circle - learn the basic ritual for meeting and wearing a mask, how to "listen" to the mask, and play through an assortment of handmade characters.
{If you have a special mask you would like to share, you are welcome to bring it for play!} Space is limited for this workshop

title: Mateada with Gauchos del Fuego
description:
The idea is to represent the typical "Mateada" that is similar to Hookah but instead of tabaco we use yerba mate and instead of fire we use hot water for "Mate" and cold water or any juice for "Tereré".

Is typical to gather around a fire, in a table, a plaza or any public space with friends, family and people in general to share this natural, revitalizing and energetic drink.
print_description:
Come and meet Argentinian burners and have some Mate. We'll be around our Souk: Gauchos del Fuego.

We will share this magical beverage :)

title: Mat Pilates @ ShangriLa
description: Come & play early! Core strength is the foundation of Pilates exercise. The core muscles are the deep, internal muscles of the abdomen and back. When the core muscles are strong and doing their job, as they are trained to do in Pilates, they work in tandem with the more superficial muscles of the trunk to support the spine and movement. Centering, Control, Flow, Breath, Precision, and Concentration: These six Pilates principles are essential ingredients in a high quality Pilates workout. Pilates mat exercises will develop strength, flexibility, coordination and balance.
print_description: Come & play early! Centering, Control, Flow, Breath, Precision, and Concentration: These principles are essential in a high quality Pilates workout.

title: Maturing Masculine Intimacy Potentials-For Men
description:
There are essential, innate masculine qualities that we can intentionally access, develop, embody and transmit, hidden potentials that enhance and deepen intimate relatedness. In this Experiential Crucible we will delve, inquire and explore to discover and develop our Intimacy Navigational Mastery. What do women yearn for from us? How do we ground our own systems to both hold onto and express our desire, passion, strength and truth, especially in the face of intense beauty, emotionality and irrationality of the feminine?

1. Mastering Arousal States, emotional and sexual

2. Being a Steady, Stable Conductor amidst the chaotic

3. Transparency: balancing containment and disclosure

4. Purpose, Presence, Patience and Potential

**2 workshops: 

1st men only, 2nd women welcome included
print_description: Hone your intimacy navigation via improv, movement & embodied storytelling, with the focus on grounding attention, governing arousal & transparency.

title: Meadful Things
description:
Meadful Things is a camp devoted to mead, the oldest alcohol.  You taste history in the honey derived meads served here.  

Featured meads this year:
* Mexican Coffee Flower
* Tupulo Honey and Madagascar Vanilla
* Almond
* San Francisco Wild Flower
* Killer Mead Shine

If we're not home we'll leave a bottle or two on the table.  

We've teamed up with Hooch House this year so look for the white monkey hut and patchwork sign.
print_description: The oldest alcohol produced by every civilization.  Flights taking off in the afternoon through late night.

title: Mead Workshop @ the BuzzInn
description: Honey has long been treasured not only for its sweetness but for its ability to be converted into Mead, a honey based wine. We'll cover the home mead making process and what you need to ferment your own batch at home.  We will give a brief background on mead including some of the traditional mead varieties such as Cyser, Methelglin and Melomel which may include fruits, herbs and spices.  So come by the Buzz-Inn to get your Buzz-On!
print_description: Mead is a honey based wine. We'll cover the home mead making process and what you need to ferment your own batch at home.

title: Me and Mother Earth
description: Connecting Through Your Roots. Through breathing, cleansing and guided meditation, establish your divine connection with Mother Earth. Gravity central. w/KC. Grounding is a vital component of daily balanced living. It allows us to deepen our connection with mother earth, or Gaia, and source energy. It teaches us how to release stress, stay focused, clear the chatter from our minds and auric fields, and eliminate free radicals from our bodies. When we connect with Gaia, we begin to realize that we are all safe and well provided for. We learn to understand our greater truths and to let go of fear, anger, guilt and anxiety. This allows us to establish a connection with our divine authentic self. Whether you are a seasoned meditator or novice, you are invited to experience an ancient Eastern meditation breathing technique that has been passed on from master to master for centuries to achieve self-enlightenment. In this workshop you will learn about the chakra system, with an emphasis on the root, sacral and solar plexus. Our chakras govern our life force energy as well as our glandular, mental and emotional systems. Through the use of sage, crystals and sound we will also start to understand basic cleansing of our auric field and our surroundings. We will utilize ancient grounding techniques and a guided meditation to establish our connection with Gaia, help transform our outlook, and feel more grounded in our everyday lives.
print_description:
Connecting Thru Your Roots. Thru breathing, cleansing & guided meditation, establish your divine connection with Mother Earth. Gravity central
w/ KC.

title: Meditation Bridging the Gap btwn Science&Spiritual
description: Join Dr. Nikki, MD turned yogi, and an eclectic panel of speakers as they bridge the gap between science and spirituality with regards to the ancient healing practice of meditation. New studies within the medical literature will be discussed, as well as an exploration of the myriad of meditative techniques and lineages. Speakers include experienced meditators in breath, dance, Kundalini, Transcendental, chanting, mindfulness, and more. Come ready to sit and taste a guided meditation in each modality!
print_description: Join Dr. Nikki, MD turned yogi, and an eclectic panel of speakers for a meditation discussion as they bridge the gap between science and spirituality

title: Meditation Deathmatch
description: Come Inside the Thunder OM...It's a game where we put EEG's on two players to read their brainwaves. We ask them to show us their war faces. Then we find out who can relax harder.Anyone can get excited in an instant, but few can relax at will.Ultimately we want to teach people to develop better control over their neurological states.With EEG we can provide people with a quantitative framework to develop their own their own techniques for neurological control.The name "meditation deathmatch" is absurd, and that's intentional because we're not recommending particular beliefs or techniques.We're not gurus.We're not going to teach you how to do it.We're just going to tell you if you're winning or not.
print_description: Come Inside the Thunder OM...A game w/EEG's on 2 players to read their brainwaves: They show us their war faces...Then we learn who can relax harder!

title: Meet the makers of the Pyramid of Possibilities
description:
Meet the makers of the Pyramid of Possibilities, and learn about all the design, woodworking, electronics, software and hard work that went into it. 

The Pyramid of Possibilities consists of 56 hexagonal platforms, arranged in a triangular pattern on six tiers. Each platform is surrounded by 220 LEDs and controlled by a microcontroller and an accelerometer. Every platform set at a different height, from 30 inches to 24 feet above ground level. Easy-to-climb ladders on three sides of every platform, fully interconnecting them, providing a virtually infinite number of paths through a 3-dimensional maze.
print_description: Meet the makers of the Pyramid of Possibilities, and learn about all the design, woodworking, electronics, software and hard work that went into it.

If you have a cushion to bring, please do.

title: Moments of Immediate Intimacy
description: What if you could walk into a room of complete strangers and feel immediately connected to everyone? Participate in a series of playful experiences designed to enable us to connect with each other swiftly, easily, and authentically. Come alone or brings your friends and lovers. Whether you are someone who initiates new relationships easily or has difficulty connecting with strangers, this experience is for you. You'll come away feeling held, nurtured, appreciated, seen, heard, and - ideally - loved. Maximum 40 participants, signup begins at SukSha on Wednesday at 9am.

title: Monster in a Box
description: An interactive art installation, fashioned when traders going east on the Slick Route were stalked by a devious, bloodthirsty creature that uses sound mimicry to lure in its victims. After killing several members of the party the monster was captured and is being brought back to civilization to be sold as a curiosity. Participants will be drawn to the crate by plaintive human or animal cries of distress. Once its victim is close by, the monster will thrash hungrily from inside the crate and give off blood curdling screams.
print_description: An interactive art installation with sound, motion and a scary surprise.

title: Moon Dance Party
description: Tranquility Bass is equipped with a Level 8 Moonscape Dance Floor. Our resident DJs—Seth, Ford and Andrew Luna—have trained in the elite spinning academies of San Francisco and Los Angeles. They are on a mission to make you dance into the next galaxy. In space everyone wants to see you groove. Launch time is 10pm on Thursday August 28th.
print_description: Have you ever danced, fucking danced on the moon? Our house (literally) dj's will dance you onto the cosmos

title: Moon Cheese: Galactic Grilled Cheese Sandwiches
description:
Moon Cheese serves celebrated grilled cheese sandwiches with love from 10PM to 2AM in a bright and beaming bastion of savory sustenance amidst the dusty darkness. Dine with us under the stars and stay by the fire for a while, your tired feet propped, your stomach filled, and your heart present as you gaze into the celestial worlds above and into the fire-lit faces of those around you, the true descendants of the heavens and sources of starlight on Earth.

This year our dinning area is greatly expanded to include more seating, warming fire, and a cuddle swing to get you closer to the Moon with your favorite person by your side.

We invite anyone to perform for our dinner guests. Our camp members often read poetry, practice performance art and give talks about our celestial origins and the universe itself as resters and revelers alike enjoy our gifted fare.

Join us each weekday night at Moon Cheese for good cheer, grilled cheese, and the grand citizens of Black Rock City.
print_description: Serving delectable grilled cheese sandwiches from 10PM to 2AM Monday through Friday. Come share dinner with friemds under the moon and stars.

title: Morning Gloryville ~ BRC Edition!
description:
"Morning Gloryville - Rave your way into the day!" is an immersive morning dance experience for those who dare to challenge morning culture and start their day in style! We’re on a soul-shaking mission to turn clubbing upside down and transform mornings into something truly remarkable, and you’re invited!

Dancing is the ultimate exercise and we humans have been doing it for thousands of years long before treadmills and yoga mats were invented! Free improvised dancing in space (no routines here) uniquely wakes up your body, mind and creativity and will leave you feeling more energized and alive than you could ever imagine. 

This is a morning movement popping up in cities across the world; invigorating the Wednesday mornings of Tokyo,  Barcelona, Sidney, New York, San Francisco, London, Bangalore, Melbourne, Brighton, Amsterdam, Dublin, Zurich, and now, Black Rock City!

What to Expect: A yoga space, massage, coconut water, and a high energy dance party to get your day started in the best possible way.  

Our Morning Gloryville San Francisco resident DJ, Rachel Torro will be shakin it behind the decks all morning!

We can't wait to boogie with you in the dust :)

*Costumes highly encouraged

*No booze

*This is a family friendly event!
print_description: Join us for some morning hydration and dance!  Expect yoga, massage, coconut water, and high energy dancing to start your day off right! No booze.

title: Museum of Transportation History's Annual Gala
description:
Did you know that Black Rock City used to have a stop on the transcontinental railroad? That an extensive subway system once rolled beneath the Playa? That at one time you could ride a streetcar from Gate to the Temple?

None of that is true! But at the Black Rock City Museum of Transportation History, we explore the fictional story of fictional transportation in a fictional historical Black Rock City. Learn about how burners got around the Playa before bikes ruled and art cars amazed. See pictures, models, and artifacts gathered since Black Rock City's fictional founding nearly 150 years ago. Hear from a guide, or if we're not around, take a self-guided tour. Perhaps most importantly, tell us your own stories, or perhaps your grandmother's, about BRC's fictional transportation past!

We'll be open during the day (lunchtime to dinnertime) starting on Monday.

Our Burner "Black Tie" Gala takes place on Wednesday night at 9PM. Fancy wine, cheese, and more! Come find us on 9:00 near Isfahan behind the museum.
print_description: Our Burner "Black Tie" Gala takes place on Wednesday night at 9PM. Fancy wine, cheese, and more! Come find us on 9:00 near Isfahan behind the museum.

title: Music and Wine Soiree
description: I like to play music with other people.   It only seems to work at Burning Man.   I play flute decently and have played a lot of Baroque, Bach, and now Debussy.   Will you come and play with me?  I also play an odd Celtic jig, Russian Lullaby, Ghost Riders, Jericho, a bit of Klezmer and other stuff.    Stop by any time to play together.  And stop by to play our giant chime sets! tinyurl.com/campnicenice2014
print_description: Join us for some flute music and share some white wine. Bring an instrument & play some duets if you like. And bring some wine to share, with 21+ folk

title: Mutt and Jeff's Piano Watering Hole
description:
Camp Pickled Monkey is back and excited to bring to the playa for the 38th straight year, Mutt and Jeff's Piano Oasis! Bringing fellow travelers hours of live piano and delicious cocktails, there is simply none other like M&J's to be found anywhere! Follow the big 8-bit eye to your oasis of merriment and music. 

In addition to the fresh drinks and live music, M&J's will offer an interactive dye station, following traditional methods of dying natural fabrics, so bring along something to dye!

Rumor has it that some traveler has left a magic bottle containing a myriad of spirits.  Are you daring enough to peer inside to see if one will grace you with their presence?
print_description: Tired of the heat and techno? Need to refresh after an epic art safari? Come share your stories and enjoy the live piano in your neighborhood oasis.

Join Kayla Wexelberg for this unique chakra-food-healing-dance experience at RhythmWave. During the dance participants will have the opportunity to smell or taste the foods (located on a food alter) that stimulate and revitalize the specific chakra vibrations, aligned with the music.

title: Naked Pub Crawl
description: This is our 11th year! Since 2004, hundreds of naked burners meet at the Man to consume a little liquid courage, and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping. Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with icy libations prepared exclusively for the ride participants. We’ll be stopping off at Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Celestial Bodies, Duck Pond, and more. If you make it to the end of the ride, the after party at Comfort & Joy will be hosted once again by a team of talented bartenders wearing nothing but their hospitality. This isn’t an event, it’s a tradition. So if you’re willing to meet the dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the playa. Mugs for the first 400 riders (and yeah, we always run out). Cheers!
print_description: 11th annual.  Get naked & meet at The Man for welcome cocktail.  Then pedal to multiple host camps on a pub crawl. Bring cup - mugs for the first 400.

title: "Naming-it" to others
description: The workshop is about building communication tools.  Specifically "Naming it" is about speaking your emotional truth to another person.  I, the facilitator, used to find it very difficult to have those difficult conversations we have to have with romantic partners, friends work colleagues and so forth.  However during my training to become a psychotherapist, not only did I learn how to "name-it", but I learned how empowering it was to do so, and my relationships and life has improved as a consequence.  As a result I want to gift the playa some of the skills I have learnt by offering a series of "Naming-it"workshops, so I can make becoming a better communicating easy and fun. So please join me and come "name-it".
print_description: Using a number of excersies and role playing we will practice naming it to others, with Eleanor.
