title: Narwhalular Genetics
description: Think narwhals are cool enough without DNA? Not so fast! Some of the greatest narwhal features and traits are directly related to their genes. Learn the basics of narwhal genetic pathways, some of which are surprisingly similar in humans, and discover the narwhal within.

title: Natural Rainbow over the Man
description:
A natural rainbow will be created in the sky over “The Man” on Tuesday and Thursday afternoons from 5:30 to 6:30 P.M. 

The rainbow will be created and viewable from the Playa about 150 feet from the man, located at 7:00ish and will be seen over his right Shoulder.

It will be painted in the sky by the Rainbow Maker Rainbow Fred using 30 gallons of water, sunlight and air. More on Stern’s work is at

http://www.rainbowmaker.us.M. The rainbow will be created and viewable from the Playa about 200 feet from the man, located at about 2:30ish and will be seen over his Left Shoulder.

It will be created by the Rainbow Maker Rainbow Fred using 30 gallons of water, sunlight and air. More on Stern’s work is at http://www.rainbowmaker.us

title: Navigating Altered States/The Ayahuasca Experience
description: At this workshop psychotherapist Meriana Dinkova will introduce some important factors to consider when navigating altered states of consciousness. Some of those tools are especially applicable when working with Ayahuasca. She will share some useful tools that can maximize our experience, as well as what we can learn, in those inner voyages. Non- ordinary states of consciousness can come with their own sets of 'superpowers', operating principles and potential pitfalls. Knowing how to use those forces for expansion, and alignment, can not only occasionally save you from 'the inner gates of hell', but also bring accelerated growth, ecstatic experiences, and a deep feeling of connectedness with yourself, others, and the world.
print_description: Meriana Dinkova MFT will share tools on navigating consciousness, which will enrich your psychonautic tool kit and empower your inner shaman.

title: New Day's Eve
description: Why do we only celebrate the New Year? Why not celebrate each and every new day.  Watch the ball drop over Playa Times Square as we celebrate New Day's Eve nightly Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday starting at 11:30PM.   Come out and see Father New Day, Baby Time and celebrate the new day with friends old and new.  Make your resolution for tomorrow on the resolutions board.  Remember, you only need to keep your resolution for one day.  So what do you want to do tomorrow? Event is BYOC (Champagne)
print_description: Why do we only celebrate the New Year?  Come out and celebrate each new day at Midnight. Make your resolution for tomorrow.  Event is BYOC (Champagne)

title: New Year's Party
description: New Year’s Eve on the playa like you always dreamed! Sip champagne, watch the ball drop & kiss at midnight. Black tie encouraged.
print_description: New Year’s Eve on the playa like you always dreamed! Sip champagne, watch the ball drop & kiss at midnight. Black tie encouraged.

title: New York Dangerous Shooting Gallery!
description: Join New York Dangerous as we refine our caravansery archery skills - each day from noon-5 you can take aim at hanging tires, flamingos, and whatever else we find around camp that would be fun to shoot arrows at.
print_description: Target practice with composite bows and foam arrows make a loud whistle and pleasing thunk as you channel your inner Katniss Everdeen at fun targets.

title: Night Art Tour
description:
Wheelchair accessible Art tour into the Deep Playa Art.
2-3+ hours, can run much later. All welcome, but preference always given to the Mobility Impaired, worst come, first served!Check out the Deep Playa Art at night!
Stop by and sign up!

Channel your inner 4th grade being with 2 hours of dodgeball. Lighted courts, music and smart-assed announcers. Just show up and play for as long as you want. 13 years or older only please.
Facebook.com/DodgeballAddiction

In the past we've had anything from live kirtan, to tea service, to sound baths, hang music, and more to entertain people with. More to come as the burn gets closer. :)

Bringing some awesome Assam chai tea for everyone to enjoy!
Made the traditional Indian way - just the same taste as having it at a street tea stall in India!

title: Noir Radio Hour
description: Murder! Dames! Dramatic organ music! Come by our detective office and experience the entertainment of a bygone era as we play archival detective radio shows from the 1930s and 40s. We'll ply you with bourbon as you take in the adventures of Philip Marlowe, Richard Diamond, and other legendary gumshoes. It's a fun evening...with a body count!

title: Nurturedance
description: Nurturedance is a movement form that provides methods for making safe, loving, and nurturing connections between people. By holding, rocking, and cradling each other, a direct path is formed to deep and visceral experiences of nurturance. 	Some of the movements we do induce mutual trance states by using repetitive circular motion. A hug that evolves into a spiral that is so safe and supported that we enter graceful states of consciousness. 	If you are looking for ways to enhance your relationship with your partner, this may be useful. Relating in non-verbal, non-linear fashion can have an effect of breaking through barriers of relating on new and different levels. People report that using these methods deepens and re-invigorates their relationship.
print_description: Make safe, loving and nurturing connections in dance by holding, rocking and cradling eachother

title: NurtureDance w/DJ DeepFlow @RhythmWave

title: NV State Health Div: Permit Pick-Up at Playa Info
description:
Nevada State Health Division will be available at Playa Info at Center Camp from Sunday, the 24th through Friday, the 29th to hand out food permits and answer any questions. Food vendors may not operate until they have picked up their permit from us at this location. Permit applications must have been approved in advance; permits will not be issued on-site. 

The deadline for submitting a food permit application is August 15th. If you have not already submitted your application, please do so ASAP. If you are found serving food to the public without a permit, your operation will be closed. Please plan ahead.
print_description: Come pick up your food permit at Playa Info in Center Camp from 1-2:30pm Sunday(24th) thru Friday (29th). Retrieve permit before food service begins.

print_description: Join Outpost23 resident DJ’s for a deep breath of Progressive Trance, House, Deep House and Electro on your first official day on the playa.

title: Obsolete scientific theories
description: Everything you know is wrong. We'll critically re-examine the world using Aristotelian physics, Ptolemaic cosmology, the miasma theory of disease, and some of our other favorite obsolete scientific theories.
print_description: Everything you know is wrong. We'll critically re-examine the world using Aristotelian physics, Ptolemaic cosmology, and other favorite theories.

title: Obstacle Course
description: Our obstacle course will range from object manipulation and the flow arts, to army crawling under elwire and many more tasks throughout our camp. As each member crosses the finish line we will record how many veterans and virgins have completed the course with the quickest time.
print_description: Virgins VS Veterans. Who can get the best time?! Come show off your skills and tactics and find out who our winner will be!

title: Occidental Oasis Job Fair!
description:
Get in on the ground floor as a first-round employee of Occidental Oasis Holdings, an exclusive timeshare resort offering 1/70,000 ownership in BRC! 

Opportunities at BRC, with future expansions across the US and at international burns too!  Highest commissions in the industry!  Short hours, you can even learn to work from home!

Learn about the BRC Properties:  Hex Village, Yurt Villas, and Black Rock Estates. These gated communities provide free Wi-Fi and HDTV broadcast of the burns, two-bike garages, and plumbing in the BRC-Municipal Utility District (MUD).

Package levels available:  Sparkle Pony, Shirt Cocker, Veteran, Wanderlust (at regional events), and Ambassador (at international events).  Optional package add-ons include sky diving arrivals, helicopter exodus, personal art car, plus more!

If sales isn't your thing, become an Occidental Oasis concierge!  OO Resorts' concierge service has its fingers on the pulse of Burning Man.  We know exactly what is going on when and where and how well it matches our guests' personal profile.  We will provide a daily briefing and a schedule of suggested experiences that may be of interest to our honored sales prospects.
print_description: Get in on the ground floor as a first-round employee of Occidental Oasis Holdings, an exclusive timeshare resort offering 1/70,000 ownership in BRC!
other_location: Occidental Oasis - Souk @ The Man Base

title: Official Queer Burner Meet & Greet

print_description: It the real deal! Join every LGBTQ++ burner & friends for a great evening. Super amazing! Then head over to BloAsis for to continue the evening.

title: One Time at Burning Man

print_description: First timers and experienced burners gather around the Silicon Village stage to hear and tell their tales of Burning Man, "One time at Burning Man."

title: Ooey Gooey Science!
description: Come play with us at Zooniverse! Together we will make and explore everyone's favorite Pre-K science solutions - Ooblek, Cloud Dough and Giant Bubbles. Engage in open ended, hands-on fun while exploring these ooey gooey substances. Try all 3 or stay with the magical substance you love most. Hand washing station (of sorts) available on the way out, so don't be afraid to get dirty. We welcome and encourage playa animals of all ages. Happy learning!
print_description: Come get dirty at Zooniverse! Make and explore everyone's favorite pre-K science experiments - Ooblek, Cloud Dough and Giant Bubbles! All ages welcome

title: PBN: Telethon to raise money for the kids and stuf
description: Join us as our plethora of PBN personalities raise money for the kids.  During this one-time only telethon, your hosts will be taking “phone calls” with benevolent burners who want to support the cause.  Come watch (and donate!) as the PBN staff keeps the party going and the phones ringing.  Do it for the kids!!!!!!
print_description: Join us as our plethora of PBN personalities raise money for the kids.

title: Open Dungeon
description: Playfully Yours is a well equipped dungeon play area for beginners and the curious to intermediate level players with a focus on the more sensual side of dungeon play.  We provide instruction, supervision, and facilitate dungeon play. Our equipment include a St Andrews Cross, a seated cross, 2 benches, a suspension station, a padded saw horse, an 8 foot chain spider web, a spanking bench, and a petting zoo/cage. We offer several types of toys to include paddles, floggers, pinwheels, feathers, fur gloves, crops, and a violet wand for everyone to experience and play with. There is a lounge area with a spanking bike, lounge chairs, mini bar, and a spinning wheel to facilitate participation. Our bar features our famous "Cherry Bombs" marinated in Everclear that is only offered to those over 21 with proof of age.  There is also daily scheduled classes with demonstrations and audience participation. The classes are an Introduction into BDSM dungeon play and a Shibari sexy body rope tying classes. The dungeon is open for play day an night (generaly from 11 am to 3 am).
print_description: We are a fully equipped dungeon with a variety of bdsm toys for the curious to intermediate to play. We have daily classes. Open day and night.

title: Open Fire Spin
description: Come join Zoomers for an open spin during our party Monday night.  We provide the fuel and you provide the performance, more fuel is welcome.  We will have some tools available to play with.  Zoomers will also be spinning in force:)
print_description: Come join Zoomers for an open spin during our party Monday night.  We provide the fuel and you provide the performance, more fuel is welcome.

title: Opening Fire Ceremony
description: Opening Fire Ceremony & The One Flame ~ Utilizing the sun and a spiral mirror Crimson Rose extracts a flame from the sun and a fire is lit in a special Cauldron, El Diabla located in Center Camp. For the flame to continue burning it must be stoked, disturbed and kept alive throughout the entire week. We encourage all those that encounter El Diabla help keep this flame alive.
print_description: Extracting a flame from the sun a fire is lit in El Diabla and will burn through out the week. Same Flame will support Fire Conclave to honor the Man

title: Open Kwoon and Dojo

title: Open Mic @ HOTD
description: You a singer with no band? A guitar player with no guitar or amp? A full band with no stage? Come to Hair of the Dog for our daily Open Mic from 12 - 5pm. Our stage is your stage. Our open mic's have everything from full bands, to pickup jam sessions, to getting the house band together to backup that Burner with the out of this world voice who's band decided to stay in the default world. Or maybe you just need a bass player to fill in for yours…let us know and we'll see if we have a house musician to fill their shoes. Bring your own instruments or use ours. We bring a full stage setup with drums, mic's, amps, guitars, bass, and maybe even keys. HOTD, where we provide the booze and the music, and you provide the music and the booze.
print_description: Come jam on our open stage 12 - 5pm. HOTD, where we provide the booze and the music, and you provide the music and the booze.

title: Orgasamator Experience
description: We've built an I-Scream Parlour, playa style, and it's the home of the Orgasamator Experience. Yes, the Orgasamator is returning to the Camp for Sensual Pleasures, in Spanky's Village.  The Orgasmatron had been a fixture at Burning Man for many years, giving thousands of women exceptional physical pleasure in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private.  Four years ago we took everything we had learned from it, completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and we gave it a new name: The Orgasamator.  Development has continued with a singular goal of maximizing sensuality, along with our guests’ overall pleasure and comfort.  When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience.  You will leave feeling refreshed and respected.  Come solo, or better yet, bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience.  You can wear as much or as little as you would like while riding this marvelous machine, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense, and no penetration is involved. If you are a woman, the Orgasamator Experience at our I-Scream Parlour is something you won't want to miss. Visit us at the Camp for Sensual Pleasures, in Spanky’s Village, and also ask about The Pope’s Massage & Hair Washing.
print_description: The Orgasamator offers intense physical pleasure in an environment that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private.  Exit refreshed & smiling.

title: Otic Way
description:
Escape from the hustle, bustle and cacophony of our growing city.  Appreciate the indigenous stillness and aesthetics of the Black Rock desert in a cordoned-off zone free of motorized vehicles and loud amplified music. The Otic Way is a wilderness outpost providing an
audio antidote and alternative of peace and quiet, deep in Walk-In Camping, where no motorized vehicles are permitted and large scale sound systems don’t penetrate.  At last, a retreat where the aural options are in keeping with the indigenous stillness and aesthetics of the Black Rock Desert. It will provide shade and shelter to weary travelers who might require a bit of tranquility and quiet in order to recharge and allow them to commune with their internal and external environments. The Otic Way is an arc of individual Satellites with a central Shade area, composed of geometric crystalline clusters of interwoven modules, that provide individualized and group spaces for meditation and contemplation of the sunrise, sunset and our natural surroundings. The biomimicry of the design complements the desert backdrop and offers a manmade structure that takes inspiration from the rocks, mountains, caves, and plateaus found in nature. It is made completely of interlocking wood, with no nails or metal fasteners.
print_description: Wilderness outpost of interlocking geometric structures, free from motorized vehicles and loud music, providing quiet space for communing with nature.

title: Palenque Norte Lecture Series
description:
The Palenque Norte lecture series brings together scholars, visionaries, entrepreneurs and activists to discuss psychedelic topics.

The Palenque Norte journey began with the legendary Entheobotany Conferences held at the Chan Kah hotel near the ancient Mayan ruins just outside of Palenque, Mexico. There, Terence McKenna, Jonathan Ott, Ann & Sasha Shulgin, and a host of other psychedelic luminaries passed along many insights, discoveries, and wild tales to the fortunate Tribe members who were there. And it was at the end of the pool where Terence McKenna gave some of his last talks at the Chan Kah.

Years later, then in 2003, a few alumni from those conferences decided to have a "Palenque reunion" at the Burning Man Festival, and so they organized a lecture series to continue the Palenque tradition.
print_description: The Palenque Norte lecture series brings together scholars, visionaries, entrepreneurs and activists to discuss psychedelic topics.

title: Parenting Coaching
description:
Figuring out a great relationship with your kids is possible.

No, you won't be able to control them. No, you won't stop them from doing things that you did. But you can be there for them and be someone they want to talk to.

It's critical that you know yourself first, as a parent. The more you know your own shortcomings and how to overcome them, the more your kids will respect you. We teach you not only how to know yourself, but from there, how to design who you want to be.
print_description: Know yourself first. The more you know your own shortcomings and demonstrate how to overcome them, the more your kids will respect you.

Bring a Yoga mat, water and your oh so fine selves. We provide instruction under a HUGE shade canopy @ SpinCycle!

We want to share our love of the connection, grace, and passion in these dances with our Burning Man family.  Come join us for a lesson, stick around and dance with some campers during the guided practice, and have a cup of tea with us in the evening when we light up the dome over our dancefloor.

title: Party Naked and Get Lei'd
description: Party Naked is returning to the Playa for our sixth year to provide libations to thirsty Black Rock City citizens 21 and over. You must be 21 or over to Party here and we do ask for and check ID's (it's always good to carry your ID while at Burning Man). We start the mornings with Bloody Mary's at 9:00am until we run out. We then dispense our "Tiki Punch" (yes, it has a punch) well into the night. Party Naked Tiki Bar is the clothing optional bar that rewards your getting naked. This year we have 1500+ hand painted commemorative leis to give to citizens that "do it". Make sure to come by early and get lei'd. We will also have activities scheduled for fun at the bar, check out our schedule when you come by. We promote a no pressure relaxed atmosphere where you can get naked or not. Come by for a cool drink where you can sit and chat or meet new people. Enjoy our classic rock atmosphere music and a little shade in the heat of the day. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup please.

title: Peepshow freaKKshow
description:
Open day & night to peeper and peepees, Times Square Peepshow has the hot bodies on playa. What will your inner peepshow performer do?

Kostume Kult recreates the glory days of NYC circa the 1970's by transporting you to the seedy throwback replica of "Times Square BRC". The Empire State Building and 25ft King Kong loom above the NYC skyline while a runway show that blows fashion week out of the dust goes on street level starring you. As a premiere daytime destination, Kostume Kult will be providing costume transformations to the under-accessorized masses of BRC. No person shall go uncostumed or unfabulous because we have a full team of costume stylists ready to dress you up and help you transform. The only thing we ask of you is a proud strut down our runway to display your new duds to booty moving music. If you prefer a DIY approach, step inside our Krafting Dome where you can gain the supplies and know-how to upgrade your bike and your look. Our professional staff knows their way around a glue gun and we're not afraid to bedazzle YOU! The playa provides the grit, we supply the glamour so hop the K Train to costume transformations, music and a non stop runway show that would make RuPaul blush. Of course the city never sleeps and our amazing DJ line up keeps us moving into the night as the city lights shine bright into the dark playa night. Also not to be missed is the Peepshow FreaKKshow, BRC's only 24 hour participatory peep show where you can be the star or simply sneak a peek at some Big Apples! Down our alleys you will find costumes, crafting, sparkle pony vagrants, playa hustlers, burner working gals and street wise tramps. You won't want to miss it so jump the turnstile to the KKrossroads Of The World. After all if you can make it here you can make it anywhere!
print_description: Open day & night to peeper and peepees, Times Square Peepshow has the hot bodies on playa. What will your inner peepshow performer do?

title: Pele's: Power of the Feminine Within
description: Pele, as part of Red Lightning, will lead an interactive workshop on reclaiming the lost feminine power within each of us! Here, you will learn to access the potent power of the creative life force hiding within you. She’ll offer techniques to tap into your deepest emotional core, and then, you’ll learn how to master these emotions with choice, rather than just being at their mercy.  Come experience leading from inspiration and thusly, giving by receiving.  Come play with Pele and the rest of the brothers and sisters who join in this session, and find the wellspring within you. Together, we can change this world in a heartbeat!
print_description: Learn to reclaim your potent feminine creative life force, tap your deep emotional core with mastery, lead from inspiration & give by receiving.

We mix two part epoxy with colorings, and grind it when the epoxy dries. Leaving you with a neat piece of wearable swag and a sense of accomplishment. Easy for the beginner and as challenging as you wish to make it.

You must sign up before (usually fills). One hour classes 12-5pm (10 people each class). Find us on Playa Info.

title: Planets, stars, nebulae and supernovas!
description: The Black Rock Observatory will be open from 11am to 4pm and from 7pm to 3am. During the day the BRO's focus will be on the sun. You are welcome  to peer up into the sun and experience solar flares with your naked eyes. Then, using only the power of the sun just observed, the BRO staff will help you use a fresnel lens to melt metal or glass in an awesome display of solar powered destruction! The BRO is also the home of Dustiny, the Mars Rover Art Car! There will be asteroids and other intergalactic gizmos and gadgets to play with and connect with the galaxy in ways you never have before! At night our 20" Dobsonian will take center stage. Beginning at dusk, we will gather for telescope navigation workshops and then point the telescope up at the cosmos! You'll experience planets, nubulae and galaxies first-hand!
print_description: Stare into the sun with our solar telescopes, burn metals and cook some food using our fresnel lens and check out our asteroids and space gadgets!

title: Playa Justice
description:
Everybody loves to sue everybody else in the good old U.S. of A!  So we here at Camp Dusty Justice are celebrating that practice and bringing an open, slightly impartial, fun venue for Burners of all stripes to get their dusty dirty day in court.  Our camp will feature a sultry judge (with a real law degree!) known for her fairly fair and reasonably reasonable decisions.  If you are convicted or found liable, you can accept her sentence, which is guaranteed to be interesting or you can try your luck at the wheel of punishment.  Or you may win your case and see your opponent subjected to Playa justice.  Either way, someone always pays!  Whatever the choice or the outcome, you can be assured of an unbalanced hearing…for the Playa, that is.
 
Bring your case!  You will be heard!  Is it your noisy neighbor?  A spat with a girlfriend?  Did a campmate drink your last cold beer?  Maybe it was just your turn to drive the art car.  Whatever the dispute, our jurist will sort it out.

We will hold court twice during the week or if an emergency arises.  Join us Wednesday afternoon and Friday afternoon from 3-5 for fun, laughs, and some serious judgments and some wicked punishments.
print_description: Imagine Judge Judy meets well...you! Bring your dispute, whatever it is, and we'll get it sorted out. Dusty Justice is fun and fairly fair.

Anything goes when it’s late night on the playa.

title: Playa on Tap Talk
description: If you drink bottled water, do you know where your water comes from and do you know what you are paying for? Chances are, it comes from your own municipal water source, but you are paying 700% of your tap water cost. Educate yourself about the sources, costs, health risks and scam of the bottled-water industry. Once you know the facts, you’ll likely never drink bottled water again. You’ll also learn how to break the bottle-habit and easy ways to drink tap water on the playa.
print_description: Educate yourself about the sources, costs, health risks and scam of the bottled-water industry. Once you know, you’ll likely never drink bottled water

title: Playasophy Talk: What Is Burning Man?
description: Join us for our 4th annual open discussion on this community, and what it all means. We will also be philosophically "pre-gaming" for the big event.
print_description: Join us for our 4th annual open discussion on this community, and what it all means. We will also be philosophically "pre-gaming" for the big event.

title: Playa Speaker Series
description:
Join us at Center Camp Spoken Word Stage for short form talks designed to educate and stimulate.  We'll be talking politics, sex, nomadism, and all things facinating about our community 9am-11am Mon-Sun on the Spoken Word Stage, and 4p-5p Tues-Sun on the Performance Stage. 
The speaker series expansion in Center Camp Cafe this year was inspired by the events' choice of theme, Caravansary. Not just in topic, but in the ideal of searching to expand our perception of reality through intellectual exchange. In our research we started having some very interesting conversations regarding, what we're exploring; what kind of impact we want to make, what kinds of conversations we're inspired to have about the past and the present; and how those conversations can impact our future.
print_description: Join us at Center Camp Spoken Word Stage for  talks designed to educate and stimulate. Short Form: 9am-11am Mon-Sun and Long Form: 4p-5pm Tues-Sun

title: Playastan Crossroads
description: Tuesday 11:11 AM - 1:11 PMPlayastan Crossroads Inner Playa near 3:00Don't meet the author! Instead, hear Dr. Harem Scarem, professor of Playastanian History, mix fact with fiction about Playastan Crossroads, an installation of painted silk banners and graceful arches calling to mind the Silk Road. Hear possibly true tales! Wonder if Gerlach really was a part of the Han Dynasty! Thrill to the flapping of colorful silk, driven by the hot air of the desert and the Professor! See The "Book" and marvel at its ancient-looking pages! No one turned away for lack of funs.
print_description: Don't meet the artist! Instead, hear Dr. Harem Scarem, professor of Playastanian History, mix fact with fiction about Playastan Crossroads.

title: Playa Wedding: Jendra & Alec's 15th Anniversary
description:
It's an open burner wedding, playa style.  Join us as we renew our vows in celebration of our 15th anniversary.  Much of our camp (Kostume Kult) and New York Dangerous will be in attendance, as the head of NYD is officiating.  
 
Photographers and filmmakers encouraged to attend and/or participate.  We are professional cinematographers ourselves and it will be very visual.  Our costumes will be fabulous, there will be a professional tango performance, there will be fire spinners!

Meet by the TOAD art car by the Embrace statue by 9PM.
print_description: 15th anniversary Vow Renewal Playa Wedding. Meet by the TOAD art car by the Embrace Statue by 9PM. Photographers and filmmakers encouraged to attend.

title: Playful Pathways (Funky Fun Vinyasa of the Hoop)
description: Play in new circular territory ~ full-body, playfully curious mind-body-awareness training. Engage with coils, curls, shape, and space. Dance in full-body expression, pulsation, repeating patterns drawn from dance, yoga, flow, and funkiness. The hoop reveals alignment, attention, and energy flow through our bodies’ language of circularity rather than spinning. We will be opening the body and shakin’ the booty! Treasure is waiting for you no matter your level of experience. You will leave with embodied space, strength, joy & grace, ready to take on a night of dancing or Brandon's Acro class!
print_description: Hoop with Michelle Nayeli in new circular territory ~ full-body, playfully curious mind-body-awareness training. Coils, curls, shape, and space.

The PlayGround is a place to explore the inner you, a place to reconnect with the playful, naughty, exuberant person dying to cast aside the straight jacket society encumbers us with.

title: Ploetry - The Playa Poetry Project
description:
Come meet the artist AND create next year's Ploem.

Ploetry is inspirational prose cut out from planks of wood, hung from a 5-sided city-shaped tower, with color-changing backlight and custom seating.

The first entry, "I Am But Wood", is a poem written from the point of view of the Man. Next year, we want to add more Ploems, scattered as Easter Eggs around the Playa. Write a ploem, build an installation, or both  - we'll show you how. This is a workshop - all building is done off playa. But take your inspiration to write your Ploem while in Black Rock City!
print_description: Meet the artist AND help create next year's Ploem. Words cut from wood planks are hung from a 5-sided backlit tower. Help fill the Playa with towers!

title: Poly High Juice Box
description: Thought poly was complicated enough? Try adding children to the mix. Whether you're Poly With Children, or otherwise in an open relationship involving children, this special Poly High Tea discussion is for you. If all this seems overly daunting, don't worry, it is! So let's put our dusty heads and hearts together and see what we come up with. Bring the kids and lets hear from them if you like! We are brave, aren't we? This is an open discussion facilitated by Peter & Gretchen (aka Adam & Eve) about all things poly with children. And just so you don't think you'll get all the answers from us, we are standing at the precipice with a 3 year old. And next year she will be coming to Burning Man and camping with Poly Paradise. So please come to learn and to teach! Juice boxes and animal crackers provided to help grease the conversation.
print_description: Thought poly was complicated enough? Try adding children to the mix.this special Poly High Tea discussion is for you.

title: Poly High Tea
description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
print_description: All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of Polyamoury.

title: Poppin' on the Playa
description:
One hour of Popping fundamentals with a well-known bay area female Hip Hop Artist named Fluidgirl. 

"Popping is a street dance and one of the original funk styles that came from California during the 1960s-1970s. It is based on the technique of quickly contracting and relaxing muscles to cause a jerk in the dancer's body, referred to as a "pop or a hit". This is done continuously to the rhythm of a song in combination with various movements and poses." - via Wikipedia :)

Styles to be shared: Robot, Waving and Tutting

Fluidgirl will be taking you on a movement journey  so you can showcase your cool, new skills with your camp mates, new friends and on the playa!
print_description: Hip Hop Dance: POPPING

title: Practical Sword Training
description:
Come learn how to fight with a sword. A real living technique, honed over thousands of years and used in wars up to this very day. 

We will focus on practical techniques that are simple and can be applied to any object: sword, stick or pipe. Learn the basic cuts, thrusts and blocks that will serve you to demolish your enemies.  Hone your skills before joining the Massive Sword Battle 2.0, Thursday 6:00 pm at the Golden Dragon at The Man.

title: Random Inspection
description:
You Know You Want It:
Do your knots conform to cub scout standards? Can your camp withstand 60 MPH winds? Are those crisscrossing strings and stakes a nocturnal deathtrap? Is that flimsy carport destined to fly across this playa like Dorothy’s shack? Hard-hat wearing, clipboard-carrying, semi-qualified men and women will conduct random inspections on the hardiness of your unit and issue seals of approval or failure, after bossing you around to their liking and showing you the business end of a rebar cutter. Results guaranteed.

title: Recitation of Lotus Sutra: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo
description: Join us in our Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra) In the Lotus Sutra Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo an individual is able to awaken this enlightenment the Buddha revealed and reveal their own buddha nature. A practitioner of this buddhism through chanting and study can transform their life and create a state of unshakable happiness overcoming the sufferings of birth and death. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting together we will study a buddhist concept, answer questions and share experiences about the practice and its application to our daily life. All are welcome to join us even if you have never chanted before.
print_description: Join us for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo-- the chanting of the Lotus Sutra, and reveal your own buddha nature.

title: Reckless Rainbow high noon social
description:
The Rainbows are hosting a showdown at high noon. You show up, we get down. Or you come down, we'll show off. Or we grow up and you sit down... heck, who knows?

You can choose to have a Reckless Spank and then cool off with a delightful Rainbow Drink... or you could go wild with a Reckless Drink followed by a colourful Rainbow Spank!!

You could try your hand at pinning the moustache on the hipster or challenge one of our gladiators to a high noon zebra dual. Maybe you'll be the one to smash the unicorn piñata, or will the buddhist limbo get the better of you..? 

So many mixed up images to choose from, so little time. Only one way to find out what's really happening..
print_description:
Reckless Drinks and Rainbow Spanks!
...or was it.. Reckless Spanks and Rainbow Drinks!

No one's quite sure. Let's find out together...

title: Recovering the Soul of the Cosmos
description: For the past several hundred years, Western society as a whole has been primarily influenced by the dogma that matter is as that is actually "real," and that the best way to understand reality is to approach it like a machine, seeing how its parts function. This approach, while making possible the unprecedented technological advances that began during the industrial revolution, have likewise led us to an unprecedented state of emergency - primarily seen in the ecological crisis. To remedy the alienation and disenchantment that this still dominant paradigm has propagated, we must recover those dimensions of the cosmos and of our own being that can't be found or explained in material terms. Opening our "archetypal eyes," as depth psychologist James Hillman put it, can help us to once again move in rhythm with the threads of meaning that weave through our lives and the cosmos as a whole.
print_description: A discussion of archetypal cosmology as a pathway toward dispelling the disenchanting effects of materialist reductionism.

title: Recycle Your Aluminum Cans!!!
description: Black Rock City is a "Pack It In, Pack It Out" city, There are no trash cans or recycling bins. You are responsible for disposing of waste properly. Do you want to reduce the amount of recycling you will have to pack out? Start by separating your your recyclables from any landfill trash. Then separate all your aluminum cans and bring them to Recycle Camp. We are located in Center Camp at 6:00, directly behind the Cafe. The camp is "Open" and ready to accept your cans Monday through Sunday, 9am to 5pm. Bring your clean, separated aluminum cans only. We definitely don't want your trash. We also do not accept any other recyclables, you can take them to one of the 24 hour recycling stations on your way back to Reno, check out your Survival Guide for more information. We provide a sorting area to check your cans for anything that isn't aluminum. Then you can ride the bike powered can crusher and crush your cans. After your cans get crushed, you will put your crushed cans into the large containers at the camp. All proceeds from the aluminum are donated to the Gerlach K-12 School in Gerlach, NV. Come join in the fun while doing a good thing for the planet and Black Rock City..!
print_description: Recycle Camp!!! Bring us your aluminum cans. We are located in Center Camp at 6:00 directly behind the Cafe. The camp is "Open" Monday-Sunday 9am-5pm.

title: Reiki
description: Come enjoy Reiki, a Japanese technique for relaxation that also promotes healing.  It's done through touch. A warm and soothing energy flows from the hands into the participant, promoting relaxation and releasing tension.  The participant  will be asked to where headphones playing ambient tones and soundscapes for the duration of session to also experience the healing of sound combined with Reiki.  Sessions can be given in 15 minutes to 1 hour depending on the participants needs.  Our Reiki healer will sit down with each participant for a short conversation before the session to allow them to connect and become absolutely comfortable with one another.  Reiki is joint practice between healer and participant.  The more open and accepting of the universal healing energy you are, the more powerful your session will be for both yourself and the healer.  So come, relax, be yourself and enjoy the gift of Reiki at Camp 88.  Love&Light always all ways.
print_description: Enjoy Reiki, done through touch. A warm and soothing energy flows from the hands into the participant, promoting relaxation and releasing tension.

title: Relationship Survival at Burning Man
description:
Part of the magic of Burning Man is the altogether unexpected nature of what will happen. For one week, we step outside of our usual selves, finding God in a phone booth, discovering your true authentic self in the eyes of clown on whip-its, or stumbling upon the Barbie Death Camp and Wine Bistro.

But, all this novelty can be a strain on your relationship. Once you combine it with the heat, dehydration, strange substances, strange food and even stranger campmates, your previously lovely and wonderful partner may seem to have turned into some sort of dusty alien. A dusty alien you can barely stand.

Fortunately, you can avoid a visit to the Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet with a bit of preparation and foresight. In this workshop, led by open relationship coach and multiple-Burn veteran Marcia Baczynski, you’ll find out everything you need for your relationship to not only survive, but thrive, at Burning Man. We’ll cover:

Your #1 secret weapon for avoiding fights on the playa (especially those really, really stupid ones)
- The real reason the Burn makes or breaks relationships
- What to do when you have different ideas of what “fun at Burning Man” means
- A quick and easy way to get the most out of your time together -- and apart
- Simple and practical steps you can take now to make your Burn together the best one ever

Plus, you’ll walk out with your own personalized guide for staying connected, getting what you both need and having a blast during your time in the dust.

Whether you’re a virgin burner or going home yet again, join us for a hilarious and practical workshop that will help you make sure you get to enjoy your camp, your costumes and your favorite co-conspirators.

Because “going to the Burn” shouldn’t mean “sitting in a hot tent processing.”
print_description: Relationship Survival at Burning Man

title: Revolution Camp Discussion
description: If you step back and think about it, no wonder they slander communism so much. If you presided over a system that has such glaring, howling contradictions and disparities in terms of how people lived, a system which denied a decent life to the majority of humanity, and weighed them down with tremendous oppression and superstition and ignorance, while a relative handful in a few countries lived a life of unbelievable luxury—but, more than just luxury, they continued to accumulate capital while they fought with each other over who would beat out the other through this exploitation and accumulation of capital—if you stood back and looked at that... Imagine if you said to somebody: go to a drawing board and draw up the way you think the world should be. And imagine if somebody went to the drawing board and painted a picture of the way the world is now, and they said: this is the way the world should be. I mean, there would be tremendous howls coming from all quarters of humanity, saying: What the fuck— that's the way you think the world should be, with these tremendous disparities and people, little children, dying of cholera and malnutrition and other things that could be prevented easily, while a small number battle each other to accumulate more and more wealth from the suffering of this mass of humanity—that's what you think?!...And it's not hard to see why the ruling class of capitalist-imperialists would employ a lot of people to propagate that idea everywhere they could. If you presided over such a criminally insane system, you would undoubtedly do the same.Bob Avakian
print_description: Communism. You don't know what you think you "know" about... CommunistRevolution and the Real Path to Emancipation: It's History, and our Future

title: Revolution Camp Discussion
description: Let’s imagine if we had a whole different art and culture. Come on, enough of this “bitches and ho’s” and SWAT teams kicking down doors. Enough of this “get low” bullshit. And how come it’s always the womenthat have to get low? We already have a situation where the masses of women and the masses of people are pushed down and held down lowenough already. It’s time for us to get up and get on up.Imagine if we had a society where there was culture—yes it was lively and full of creativity and energy and yes rhythm and excitement, but at the same time, instead of degrading people,lifted us up. Imagine if it gave us a vision and a reality of what it means to make a whole different society and a whole differentkind of world. Imagine if it laid out the problems for people in making this kind of world and challenged them to take upthese problems. Imagine if art and culture too—movies, songs, television, everything—challenged people to think critically, tolook at things differently, to see things in a different light, but all pointing toward how can we make a better world.Imagine if the people who created art and culture were not just a handful of people but all of the masses of people, withall their creative energy unleashed, and the time were made for them to do that, and for them to join with people whoare more full-time workers and creators in the realm of art and culture to bring forward something new that wouldchallenge people, that would make them think in different ways, that would make them be able to see things criticallyand from a different angle, and would help them to be uplifted and help them to see their unity with each otherand with people throughout the world in putting an end to all the horrors that we’re taught are just the naturalorder of things. Imagine all that.BAsics 2:8
print_description: Enough! of this popular culture of bitches and ho's and SWAT teams kicking in doors. We need a new & different art & culture that lifts the people up!

title: Rootist Yoga Workshop
description:
"What is Rootism?" My response to this in short: Rootism is a belief that the truth of our learned existence lies in the Roots of all teachings/truths and beliefs. These truths are different for everyone based on how they we raised and what we resonate with at the time of our learning. As a Rootist, we take the roots of various truths and incorporate them into our own mantra, our own way of living, to become the well rounded person that we wish to be. When you resonate with more than one truth, you are a Rootist. There are many different types of Rootist's. You could be a Christian Rootist, a Buddhist Rootist, or any type of Rootist. The moment you resonate with more than one truth & take the roots of those teachings as your truths, you become a Rootist.

Rootism is a lesson that I have learned and come to resonate with over the last few years. I am grateful to share this information with each of you. Please feel free to share this with anyone with whom you feel might be interested.

As an offset of Rootism, we have The Rootist's Way. A style of yoga that is in-tentful in it's design and sequences to help to facilitate a certain type of energy clearing and calling in of new energies.

Thank you for reading this and for wanting to know more about Rootism.

The 8 Principles of Rootism:

∞Principles of Rootism™

1. Release what no longer serves - nurture yourself & ground yourself
2. Embrace a Creative Vision
3. Move forward on your journey -Take Steps Fearlessly
4. Empathize and Feel what is going on within you & others
5. Motivate yourself & others by Truth – Check the Ecology of the Whole
6. Bridge the Mind & the Heart
7. Evolve a Pro-Sociality Lifestyle & Manifest a Greater Humanity - help others and give back
8. Revolutionize - Reveal Yourself! Open UP! Inner Knowing is Outer Showing

The acronym is "Remember"
print_description: Join Mike Pierce aka Makia from the Rootist Temple to teach a very special form of Yoga!

title: Sacred Sex~ EFT w/ Sonya Sophia
description:
Sonya Sophia is a gifted empath, master level healer and “Love Activist” with 25 years of experience in the healing arts. She is the founder of The Sophia School of Living Arts, an online healing school that produces The World Tapping Circle. This is a 90-minute, life enhancing, interactive Tapping experience within a global, online community Sonya teaches physical and emotional healing using EFT, Emotional Freedom Technique or Tapping, as a foundational practice giving people a visceral experience for their real-time transformation. Those who’ve studied with her now bring the healing gift of EFT to their own families and communities. She brings feminine wisdom, deep love, loads of laughter plus life-changing releases to audiences and workshop participants worldwide. Her mission is to support the healing of humanity and facilitate Heaven on Earth.

Her standing-room only workshops have been offered in the UK, France, Italy, the Netherlands, Germany and all over the United States, from California to New York City. As a guest speaker at the International Alchemy Conference, Leaders Causing Leaders Conference and the Conscious Life Expo, she’s brought the miracle of Tapping to ever expanding audiences. Sonya continues to teach at Transformational Festivals, including her two favorites – The Rainbow Gathering for over 20 years and Burning Man for the last 7 years.

Sonya Sophia invented and published the format for EFT Circles, now widely practiced throughout the world. She has created recordings to help people come to life, activate Divine Purpose and step into their true power.

title: Sacred Geometry Art Class
description: Free-form art class with sacred geometry in the mix! For over 2,400 years, the Golden Mean has fascinated mathematicians, biologists, artists, musicians, architects, psychologists and mystics alike. This “transcendental number,” 1.618… and the sacred geometry derived from it are the blueprint for all organic matter and growth on this planet. Artists such as Phidias and Da Vinci incorporated this sacred geometry into their works, believing it to create an aesthetically pleasing balance. Come to the Mycodelic Forest and learn a little more about sacred geometry and different ways to add it into your art while painting some works of your own. We’ve got acrylic paint, brushes and several sheets of heavy artist’s paper for you. (You might want to bring a hard, flat surface to work on, if you have one).

title: Scotchfest
description:
Yo, Mukker!! Still kickin’ y’self for missing last year, eh...?

100 bottles of single malt on the bar and you weren’t there!? Like a nightmare you can’t wake from. Except, you CAN... ‘Cause we’re doin’ it again! That’s right, Scotchfest is back -- your basic confluence of peat, dust, and obsessed freaks like you!

The rules are simpler than golf, so pay attention...

Bring a bottle of your favorite drop to the Mystikal Misfits bar (4:30 & C) at 2 pm, Wednesday, August 27th.

MALT FESTIVAL, jocko – exotic, unique, transcendent -- and we’re looking to learn what YOU like. In return, every other souser presents a bottle of their best game, so make no other plans until 6 pm. 

Be prepared for Scottish music, savory nibbles, and a superlative group of like-minded Burner scotch freaks! They don’t do this kind of thing where you live, boyo, so mark it down.

And remember, it’s an exclusive event -- NO BOTTLE, NO ENTRY.

So, if you’re tromping through the desert stour spewing feathers like a twally, know that Lassie or Laddie, skuddy roaster or minted dobber, we’ll be gettin’ belter blootered at the Misfits, mate... If you ain’t geein it yaldy, hell slap it intae ye!

And as we’re fond of saying, “A dram good time will be had by all!”
print_description: Entry requires a bottle of unique single malt scotch (no blends) where you’ll join other like-minded fanatics for a once-a-year tasting.

title: Sex, Spirituality, and Pain
description:
We are at a critical time in human evolution where these aspects of ourselves can no longer be separated. They are the cornerstones of our existence, the elemental factors that have come to determine our life’s quality. These aspects of ourselves continue to speak louder and louder and we are NOW unable to turn a false eye.

We want deeper sex and intimacy!

We have a deep burning desires for passion and creativity, eroticism and the unknown!

We want to give and receive love more powerfully, more receptively!!

We want to fully heal any wounds or past traumas around receiving love. 

We want to feel healthy, alive, and vibrant!

And yet, we so often leave our bodies in search for something more.

As pain continues to rise at an exponential rate in our working class society we are uncertain how to use one of our most powerful energy forces in our body, our sex, our dan tien, our bodies inner wisdom and guidance to heal us. We remain disconnected from these forces!

We desire to capture those moments of extacy, those moments where the divine enraptures us and our central light explodes and penetrates through us, releasing the forces of the mind and the controlling locks held in the muscles of our bodies.

This workshop will incorporate Feldenkrais techniques focused on opening up our 2nd and 4th chakras and reconnecting to our bodies, as well as group and partner interaction and discussions.
print_description: Sex, Spirituality, and Pain

title: Sexy body rope tying
description: Learn basic shibari sexy body rope tying. The class will discuss the safe use of tying ropes on the body. title: Shamanic Breath and Re-Birthing Type Techniques
description:
Connecting to our Magic and dissolving Human Duality.
An experience of our divine infinite nature leaves a powerful and lasting impression on one’s self. Breath, as one of the most primitive tools for self exploration and consciousness, can be a direct pathway to this experience. Using a combination of Andean Shammanic and Tibetan techniques, we take a solid step towards the exploration and experience of inner space, and our true energetic-absolute nature. First come first serve, limited spots available. Whether you’re a spirit explorer or embarking on a first time adventure, come ready to fly!

title: Shamanic Death And Rebirth Ceremony
description:
Karl Baba will guide participants in a "Shamanic Death and Rebirth" ceremony to make peace with life and let go of the inner baggage that weighs on our heart. 

We call in the Spirit of the Rainforest Medicine with a ritual drink of water and Palo Santo scent. Come prepared to lie down or sit and envision this is your last day on the planet. You have an opportunity to make peace with your life and everyone who has touched you, to surrender, to forgive, and emerge freshly into a new life.
Facing death can be the medicine to embrace the transformation that these powerful times offer.
print_description: Shamanic Death And Rebirth Ceremony

title: Shamanic Death and Rebirth Ceremony - Karl Baba

title: Shamanism, Psychedelics & Neuroscience
description:
Shamanism, Psychedelics & Neuroscience -Science is finding we are wired for spiritual awareness and transcendent vision. Psychedelic Placebo journey ends it.
LECTURE BY PAT SAVANT, PHD, THEN PSYCHEDELIC PLACEBO JOURNEY AT THE TAIL END.
Our brains not only have specialized regions of spiritual perception but produce those same chemicals found in the shamanic brews and plants used for millennia. Within this framework, psychedelics are entheogens-allowing a deep, vivid experience of the inner matrix of reality. Shamanic ceremonies are designed to open these doorways. drumming rattling, mushrooms, ayahuasca, San Pedro facilitate. Patricia Savant PhD
print_description: We are wired for spiritual awareness & transcendent vision. Shamanic drumming, mushrooms, ayahuasca  open doors. Psychedelic Placebo journey ends it.

title: Shaman's Death
description: Meet your death ritual. Surrender to the inevitable but now. Release ego, social ties, stuckness. Come back more alive than ever. Shaman initiation. Release old stories around your personna and ego bruises. Surrender to the inevitable but now. die. die and come back more alive than you have been in ever so long. we finish you off. this could work in your favor. On Mon, Jun 3, 2013 at 10:38 PM, Mackenzie Elizabeth Amara ‪<mea309@nyu.edu>‬ wrote:‬ SCENARIO: AS RITUAL, WE DON’T PRE ANNOUNCE THIS. participants enter the space and are immediately blindfolded and given earplugs to put in. we then gently lie them down in a circle, where they silently lay for a few minutes. at some point, someone begins to sprinkle dirt (earth) over them, to represent a burial. at some point, we gently have them rise (still blindfolded) and line them up, placing the hands of each person on the shoulders of the person in front of them. accompanied by drums, rattles, windchimes, flutes, etc. we walk them out to some chosen, semi-remote place on the playa. once there, we paint them with white paint (in ritual markings, not the whole body) and remove their blindfolds and ear plugs. we instruct them to embody various forms of development as we walk back to the original spot - first sliding over the earth, then crawling, then walking, and finally running. perhaps even dancing by the end. reaching our end, we break out into full celebration and incorporation, simultaneously mourning the person that has just died and celebrating the new person that has made the journey back with us.‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬‬Mackenzie Amara guides us shouting.
print_description: Meet your death ritual. Surrender to the inevitable but now. Release ego, social ties, stuckness. Come back more alive than ever. Shaman initiation.

title: SlaveMart at the Souk
description:
Enjoy tea of a dubious nature, become a slave for an hour or just watch the event! 

SlaveMart is an interactive performance piece that celebrates the little known 11th Principle, “Radical Self Enslavement” (sometimes known as DIY Brainwashing).
One can relax at our Tea and Slaves Shoppe and have some teas of a dubious nature while being served by beautiful slave drivers. When the time is right ten lucky volunteer enslavees will be marched up to the cat walk and be auctioned off. But this is no ordinary auction. In this one, the merchandise is king and can pick and choose among the myriad offers of the crowd below. Bids can be a ride in an art car, foot massage or perhaps the best martini on the playa. When a suitable exchange has been agreed upon the slightly deranged Auctioneer hammers the bid to a close and Slaver and Slavee go off on a one-hour adventure that is mutually enjoyable for both. And both get necklaces to boot.
print_description: Enjoy tea of a dubious nature, become a slave for an hour or just watch the event! Slave Auctions daily at 2pm, 5pm, 8pm and 10pm.

title: SNAP to Mornings
description:
We know that mornings can be hard on the Playa, trust me... I have been there. No one is their normal selves without their morning brew. It can also be hard to find if you are keeping all your cash for Ice. Don't worry though, we got you covered at Camp SNAP!

 

Please come join us (location TBD but we have been placed!), for coffee or tea. We will be serving coffee from French Press or Drip fillters. There will be a good number of flavors for people to choose from for the coffee.

 

If coffee is too much for you to handle, and you want something a bit lighter... don't worry we will also have tea. Same thing goes for tea, we will have a good number of flavors for you to choose from. Please remember to bring your own cup, we want to be MOOP conscious and also make sure to pass our LNT check. You can help, by just bringing your own cup!
print_description: Start your morning of right at Camp SNAP. We will be serving coffee & tea M-Sun from 8am to 11am. Please join us for your delicious morning brew.

title: Snow Cones and progressive beats at Paradise Motel
description: As you travel down the dusty paths be on the lookout for the palm trees and pink flamingos which tell you that you've discovered a throwback to ancient times (the 1960s) … The Paradise Motel, which is the most garish of roadside resorts, yet the best of the "no-tel" genre, where weary travelers are invited to stop in for a snow cone and enjoy some progressive beats while lounging in the shade by the "pool".   Fitting in with his year's Art Theme "Caravansary" and our own kitschy aesthetic we decided if you take kitschy and vaguely middle eastern you get ... why the silly 60s sitcom "I Dream of Jeannie" so we've recreated the inside of Jeannie's bottle as this year's "roadside attraction".   Other attractions include our resident Mad Scientist's Mutant Animal Zoo and clothes closet.  Times are approximate ... we'll have the stand open from when we wake up till we get tired.  We also appreciate gifts of bags of ice. (Must be unopened) And as always, if you show your junk, you get to cut to the front (of the snow cone queue).
print_description: Weary travelers, stop in for a snow cone, enjoy some progressive beats while lounging in the shade by the "pool".   Show your junk to cut to the front

title: Snow-cones in the desert in A Camp with No Name.
description:
Snow-cones in the desert in A Camp with No Name.
Are you tired, overworked, unappreciated, cranky and hot?  You're doing it wrong! 
Drink some water and come see the curmudgeons of ACWNN.  We're back and ready to resume beating the dead horse. 
Snow-cones doled out daily. Bring your cup, sense of adventure (we aren't serving only boring flavors - try the buttered popcorn) and willingness to make your own damn snow-cone if we are too lazy.  Bring your friends.  Bring your yelling voice.  Snark and heckling strongly encouraged.  Come back tomorrow.  Bring your own booze. Ice donations welcomed.
print_description: Are you cranky and hot? You're doing it wrong! Drink some water and come see the ACWNN curmudgeons. Snowcones doled out daily. Ice donations welcomed.

title: Snow Cones in the Sun
description:
Feeling the heat?  Want something cool?
Do a dance, tell a joke or sing a song to earn a snow cone!  We don't serve flavors. We serve colors.
print_description:
Feeling the heat?  Want something cool?
Do a dance, tell a joke or sing a song to earn a snow cone!  We don't serve flavors. We serve colors.

title: So Bright, So Tight, So Prehistoric.
description: Get a little Stone Age’d on the playa, because Friday night we’ll turn back time – from Black Rock to Bedrock, it’s happening again! Time travel with Mystopia as we throw another epic masquerade party on the playa. Come with your brightest and your tightest – it’s time to get your Bamm-Bamm & Pebbles on with new and best friends! We’ll play the beats and provide the drinks as you stomp out the night with our resident DJs on the Reverse Cowgirl Creamery. It’s anything but out-dated, so prepare for some fun and lots of Barney Rubble, err… trouble!
print_description: From Black Rock to Bedrock, come time travel with Mystopia at our epic Masquerade Party. Get your Bam-Bam & Pebbles on as we provide beats and drinks!

title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.
print_description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on!

title: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!
print_description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Buuuuuuuurp!!!

title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
print_description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—skip the pad and tampon for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Let the blood make its artistic mark!

title: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
description: Who wants to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those dried up playa boogers out of there already! Don't worry if anyone's watching you go deep with that index finger! Why not give that thumb a try! It's time for each of us to get the relief we deserve and to breathe just a little freer. And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from.
print_description: Don't suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in your nose. Go ahead and have the relief you deserve and breathe just a little freer.

title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!
print_description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today.

title: Song, Dust, Sing (singer/songwriter showcase)
description: Song, Dust, Sing is the premier open mic, singer/songwriter showcase at Burning Man...featuring amazing guest artists from Reverbia…as well as other artists from the furthest reaches of Black Rock City.  Located on Reverbia's Shade Stage,  under the large shaded and sheltered tent called The Embassy structure…performances will be shine, dust, or rain!  For artists, the sound system is high quality and for the audience...the chill factor with the carpeted shade space, while listening to music...is the place for a most enjoyable afternoon. Doug Abrahams of Sunrising Artists talent agency hosts.  *note to all sign up artists…SDS has a 1-2 song limit pending time and number of participants.
print_description: Burning Man's premier open mic, singer/songwriter showcase returns…featuring creative artist talent from the furthest reaches of Black Rock City.

title: Sonya Sophia - Tapping into MAN ~ EFT
description:
Sonya Sophia is a gifted empath, master level healer and “Love Activist” with 25 years of experience in the healing arts. She is the founder of The Sophia School of Living Arts, an online healing school that produces The World Tapping Circle. This is a 90-minute, life enhancing, interactive Tapping experience within a global, online community Sonya teaches physical and emotional healing using EFT, Emotional Freedom Technique or Tapping, as a foundational practice giving people a visceral experience for their real-time transformation. Those who’ve studied with her now bring the healing gift of EFT to their own families and communities. 

She brings feminine wisdom, deep love, loads of laughter plus life-changing releases to audiences and workshop participants worldwide. Her mission is to support the healing of humanity and facilitate Heaven on Earth.

Her standing-room only workshops have been offered in the UK, France, Italy, the Netherlands, Germany and all over the United States, from California to New York City. As a guest speaker at the International Alchemy Conference, Leaders Causing Leaders Conference and the Conscious Life Expo, she’s brought the miracle of Tapping to ever expanding audiences. Sonya continues to teach at Transformational Festivals, including her two favorites – The Rainbow Gathering for over 20 years and Burning Man for the last 7 years.

Sonya Sophia invented and published the format for EFT Circles, now widely practiced throughout the world. She has created recordings to help people come to life, activate Divine Purpose and step into their true power.
print_description: Burn through limiting issues with the masculine, inner and outer. Create healing and ignite gender alchemy in your body and life.

title: Soul Motion w/Michael Zipkin @RhythmWave
description: In the Soul Motion movement practice, we offer invitations to allow and expand our sense of self, "others," and the big space of possibility we inhabit. On and off the dance floor – on and off the playa. Spacious and wildly diverse music inspires the dancer to spiral into heart and belly, then out to share discoveries of body, breath, and spirit. Michael Z brings earthy, intelligent grace and humility to RhythmWave with "Soul Motion" Inside, Outside, Same Side".

title: Space Cowboys Black Rock Hoe Down
description:
The Space Cowboys are putting the band back together. Cue the music montage as the Unimog rolls from village to camp to backwaters junkyard to recruit the heavyweights of Playa legend for yet another run for the ages. This fleet will be more rag tag than Battlestar Gallactica’s; it will throw down more funky radio waves than Convoy; it will bodily propel you through the deep playa night and on through till morning leaving you lost and found and lying on the ground.

Ya, we’re getting the band back together, so soundcars assemble! We need you small and big, shiny, loud, fiery, and funky and our own Tamo (tamo@tamodesign.com) will help you circle your wagon with ours.

MV Confirmed:
-The Unimog
-Martha
-Sil-vi Bojon
-Dusty Rhino
-Garage Mahal Ganesh
-Love Potion Amphora
-The Dodo
-Airpusher Collective

-The TIE Fighter Art Car
-Apis Inlusio

-Mars Rover
-The Angler Fish

-Gunther the Sky Bison

And if, come Wednesday night, you find yourself wandering lost and Space Cowboy-less in the dark… Well then, read the damn location for the event you crackhead.

title: Spankings and Cookies
description:
What better way to participate at Burning Man than to get not only a spanking, but a fresh baked chocolate chip cookie* on the playa. All spankticipants must be 18 years of age or older**. We have a variety of tools to spank you with and a crew of trained fun loving campers to help you out. We are here for a fun experience, not to bruise your bum (unless that’s what you really want). All of this within the privacy of our spanking dome.

Otis’ FAQ:

Q: How hard do I have to get spanked? 
A: How hard do you want to be spanked?

Q: Can I spank my friend or have my friend spank me?
A: Yes.

Q: Do I have to be bare bottomed in order to be spanked?
A: No, but you can if you wish to be.

Q: How many spanks do I need to take in order to get a cookie?
A: At least one.

Q: Can I get a cookie without being spanked?
A: No, you must participate.

Q: Can I get a spanking and not take a cookie?
A: Yes.

Q: Do you have vegan or gluten free cookies?
A: We may have some pre-baked ones on hand while supplies last, no guarantee.

Q: Can I come back later for more spankings?
A: Yes, you are always welcome back during operational hours or after hours to be social if we are around.

*we may substitute out pre-made in the event of equipment difficulties or other logistic issues that arise.
** we reserve the right to ask for ID when in doubt of your age.
print_description: Get a spanking and a fresh baked cookie at Otis Spankmore in Silicon Village. We spank at your comfort level and for your enjoyment! (18+ only).

title: Sparkle Love Oasis Lounge
description: Sparkle Love Oasis is a tropical desert lounge. We have created a shaded chill space for you to enjoy in the heat of the afternoon, with hammocks and swings, and places to relax. We will serve you refreshing non-alcoholic drinks every afternoon (starting Tuesday and continuing through the week). There will be occasional bellydancers to entertain you, and you're welcome to play in our booty appreciation station and celebrate your love for boobies with our lovely rainbow boobs sign. This is a place to relax and rejuvenate before the sun goes down. We also have planned events throughout the week. Please check the What, When, Where for more information, or come ask us what we have going on.
print_description: Come cool off in our tropical desert oasis lounge. Refreshing non-alcoholic drinks served every afternoon, occasional entertainment, and constant fun.

title: Spiritual Activism
description: What is the role of the spiritual activist in the emergent Noosphere? Can spiritual activism and co-creativity accelerate the end of ‘againstness’? The Worldwide Wave Of Action aligned tens of thousands of spiritual activists this spring, followed by Unify's record-shattering global meditation in August. Wheels of Co-creation are bursting forth in Monterrey and Cairo this September, then India in November, just as Ethereum and other synergetic technologies appear in the cloud. Join us in a far-reaching discussion about the future of activism on the planet.
print_description: Join us in a far-reaching discussion about the future of activism on the planet.

title: Spiritual Growth & Experiences! Today! W/ Broadway
description: We’ll discuss enriching your daily life with yoga, mantras and meditation. Practice connecting to the present moment and your highest self!
print_description: We’ll discuss enriching your daily life with yoga, mantras and meditation. Practice connecting to the present moment and your highest self!

title: Spiritual Scavenger Hunt
description:
This scavenger hunt is designed to increase your connection with yourself and others, and catapult you head-first into the Burning Man experience!

The hunt will have a classic structure: a list of challenges to be completed in pairs.  A points system and time limits will determine the winner.  

The challenges make this scavenger hunt different.  Examples include:
- Ask a stranger to engage in deep eye gazing with you for a full two minutes.
- Go into the middle of the playa and yell "I love myself!" three times.
- And much more.

Rewards for winning pairs, refreshments will also be provided. Please bring some sort of camera, phone is fine.

Event will start at Camp Nimby within the BC Village.
print_description: This scavenger hunt is designed to increase your connection with yourself and others, and catapult you head-first into the Burning Man experience!

title: Starry Starry Night, Black Rock City
description:
During Burning Man 2013 I looked up at the sky on Wednesday night and saw only the very brightest of stars with the great majority of them washed out by the lights of our city in the desert.

I contrasted this in my mind with the first year I came to the play and "Instead of going to sleep I sat in the door of my tent and just let the 
glorious light of ALL THOSE STARS wash over me. I could hold my hand out and see a clear shadow on the cracked and fizzured playa, from the stars alone."

Our art project for Burning Man 2014 will be to enlist the active cooperation of approximately 68 thousand other burners as "co-artists" with Creation to turn every non-essential light in the city OFF for two hours on the night of Wednesday, August 27th from 11pm to 1am on the 28th.

Then, everyone can look up and share with me the wonder of our sky there at Black Rock City which most have never seen. To borrow a phrase we'll all be able to "take a trip and never leave the farm."

We may not succeed fully or at all but it's fun and cheap to try : ).
print_description: Look up, Blackrock. Let's dim the nonessential lights of our city in the desert between 11pm and 1am on burn week Wednesday, look up and be awed.

title: Sticks & Stones: Words that Hurt, Words that Heal
description: Explore how words both hurt and heal in how we choose to claim our identity. There has been much ado lately in the media and in our lives around words like Tranny, bitch, dyke, slut, cunt, queer, gender queer, tranimal, pussy, fag, ratchet, diva, queen, king, and the list goes on. This workshop will explore what words we use to identify, where those words come from, how words impact us, how words can both hurt us and heal us. This is designed to be a workshop for people of all backgrounds. This workshop will be a safe space for people from all perspectives on these words and all identities to explore these words and the impact they have on us. This will be a time for people to share stories of hurt and sorrow, liberation and joy and to be seen and honored in these stories. The same word that hurts one, might heal another. In this space we request open hearts and minds as we dialogue about this sensitive topic of identity, oppression, reclaiming words, creating words, and living into what these words mean. All genders, races, classes, identities, bodies are welcome and honored always.
print_description: Tranny,bitch, slut, queer, femme,butch, dyke, hunty, tranimal, cunt, pussy - omg! did you just say those words? Explore how words both hurt and heal.
